2946876Di2015UniqueSeparatorboolean hasRepeatedElements(list v) Di2015NewLine    if v.length <= 1 return false;Di2015NewLine    List less, greater;Di2015NewLine    x = v[0];Di2015NewLine    for each y in v, except v[0]Di2015NewLine        if y == xDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        else if y < xDi2015NewLine            less.add(y);Di2015NewLine        else if y > xDi2015NewLine            greater.add(y);Di2015NewLine    end;Di2015NewLine    return hasRepeatedElements(less) || hasRepeatedElements(greater);Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine

2947132Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat4 bypassPS(QuadVertexOutput IN, uniform sampler2D SceneSampler) : COLORDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float4 base = tex2D(SceneSampler, IN.UV);Di2015NewLine    float3 lumCoeff = float3(0.25,0.65,0.1);Di2015NewLine    float lum = dot(lumCoeff,base.rgb);Di2015NewLine    float3 blend = lum.rrr;Di2015NewLine    float L = min(1,max(0,10*(lum- 0.45)));Di2015NewLine    float3 result1 = 2.0f * base.rgb * blend;Di2015NewLine    float3 result2 = 1.0f - 2.0f*(1.0f-blend)*(1.0f-base.rgb);Di2015NewLine    float3 newColor = lerp(result1,result2,L);Di2015NewLine    float A2 = Opacity * base.a;Di2015NewLine    float3 mixRGB = A2 * newColor.rgb;Di2015NewLine    mixRGB += ((1.0f-A2) * base.rgb);Di2015NewLine    return float4(mixRGB,base.a);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2949692Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class StreamExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void SerializeTo<T>(this T o, Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new BinaryFormatter().Serialize(stream, o);  // serialize o not typeof(T)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T Deserialize<T>(this Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)new BinaryFormatter().Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]  // mark type as serializableDi2015NewLinepublic struct MyStructDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string StringData;Di2015NewLine    public MyStruct(string stringData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.StringData = stringData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    new List<MyStruct> { new MyStruct("Hello") }.SerializeTo(stream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var mylist = stream.Deserialize<List<MyStruct>>();  // specify type argumentDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2949829Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass XmlParser {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte[] buffer = new byte[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Length { Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Append new binary data to the internal data buffer...Di2015NewLine    public XmlParser Append(byte[] buffer2) {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer2 != null && buffer2.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine            // I know, its not an efficient way to do this.Di2015NewLine            // The EofMemoryStream should handle a List<byte[]> ...Di2015NewLine            byte[] new_buffer = new byte[buffer.Length + buffer2.Length];Di2015NewLine            buffer.CopyTo(new_buffer, 0);Di2015NewLine            buffer2.CopyTo(new_buffer, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            buffer = new_buffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // MemoryStream which returns the last byte of the buffer individually,Di2015NewLine    // so that we know that the buffering XmlReader really locked at the lastDi2015NewLine    // byte of the stream.Di2015NewLine    // Moreover there is an EOF marker.Di2015NewLine    private class EofMemoryStream: Stream {Di2015NewLine        public bool EOF { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        private MemoryStream mem_;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override bool CanSeek {Di2015NewLine            get {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override bool CanWrite {Di2015NewLine            get {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override bool CanRead {Di2015NewLine            get {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override long Length {Di2015NewLine            get { Di2015NewLine                return mem_.Length; Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override long Position {Di2015NewLine            get {Di2015NewLine                return mem_.Position;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            set {Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override void Flush() {Di2015NewLine            mem_.Flush();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin) {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override void SetLength(long value) {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count) {Di2015NewLine            count = Math.Min(count, Math.Max(1, (int)(Length - Position - 1)));Di2015NewLine            int nread = mem_.Read(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine            if (nread == 0) {Di2015NewLine                EOF = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return nread;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public EofMemoryStream(byte[] buffer) {Di2015NewLine            mem_ = new MemoryStream(buffer, false);Di2015NewLine            EOF = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected override void Dispose(bool disposing) {Di2015NewLine            mem_.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Parses the first xml message from the stream.Di2015NewLine    // If the first message is not yet complete, it returns null.Di2015NewLine    // If the buffer contains non-wellformed xml, it ~should~ throw an exception.Di2015NewLine    // After reading an xml message, it pops the data from the byte array.Di2015NewLine    public Message deserialize() {Di2015NewLine        if (buffer.Length == 0) {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Message message = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Encoding encoding = Message.default_encoding;Di2015NewLine        //string xml = encoding.GetString(buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (EofMemoryStream sbuffer = new EofMemoryStream (buffer)) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            XmlDocument xmlDocument = null;Di2015NewLine            XmlReaderSettings settings = new XmlReaderSettings();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int LineNumber = -1;Di2015NewLine            int LinePosition = -1;Di2015NewLine            bool truncate_buffer = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (XmlReader xmlReader = XmlReader.Create(sbuffer, settings)) {Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    // Read to the first node (skipping over some element-types.Di2015NewLine                    // Don't use MoveToContent here, because it would skip theDi2015NewLine                    // XmlDeclaration too...Di2015NewLine                    while (xmlReader.Read() &&Di2015NewLine                           (xmlReader.NodeType==XmlNodeType.Whitespace || Di2015NewLine                            xmlReader.NodeType==XmlNodeType.Comment)) {Di2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Check for XML declaration.Di2015NewLine                    // If the message has an XmlDeclaration, extract the encoding.Di2015NewLine                    switch (xmlReader.NodeType) {Di2015NewLine                        case XmlNodeType.XmlDeclaration: Di2015NewLine                            while (xmlReader.MoveToNextAttribute()) {Di2015NewLine                                if (xmlReader.Name == "encoding") {Di2015NewLine                                    encoding = Encoding.GetEncoding(xmlReader.Value);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            xmlReader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLine                            xmlReader.Read();Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Move to the first element.Di2015NewLine                    xmlReader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (xmlReader.EOF) {Di2015NewLine                        return null;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Read the entire document.Di2015NewLine                    xmlDocument = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine                    xmlDocument.Load(xmlReader.ReadSubtree());Di2015NewLine                } catch (XmlException e) {Di2015NewLine                    // The parsing of the xml failed. If the XmlReader didDi2015NewLine                    // not yet look at the last byte, it is assumed that theDi2015NewLine                    // XML is invalid and the exception is re-thrown.Di2015NewLine                    if (sbuffer.EOF) {Di2015NewLine                        return null;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    throw e;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Try to serialize an internal data structure using XmlSerializer.Di2015NewLine                    Type type = null;Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLine                        type = Type.GetType("my.namespace." + xmlDocument.DocumentElement.Name);Di2015NewLine                    } catch (Exception e) {Di2015NewLine                        // No specialized data container for this class found...Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (type == null) {Di2015NewLine                        message = new Message();Di2015NewLine                    } else {Di2015NewLine                        // TODO: reuse the serializer...Di2015NewLine                        System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer ser = new System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer(type);Di2015NewLine                        message = (Message)ser.Deserialize(new XmlNodeReader(xmlDocument));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    message.doc = xmlDocument;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // At this point, the first XML message was sucessfully parsed.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Remember the lineposition of the current end element.Di2015NewLine                IXmlLineInfo xmlLineInfo = xmlReader as IXmlLineInfo;Di2015NewLine                if (xmlLineInfo != null && xmlLineInfo.HasLineInfo()) {Di2015NewLine                    LineNumber = xmlLineInfo.LineNumber;Di2015NewLine                    LinePosition = xmlLineInfo.LinePosition;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Try to read the rest of the buffer.Di2015NewLine                // If an exception is thrown, another xml message appears.Di2015NewLine                // This way the xml parser could tell us that the message is finished here.Di2015NewLine                // This would be prefered as truncating the buffer using the line info is sloppy.Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    while (xmlReader.Read()) {Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                } catch {Di2015NewLine                    // There comes a second message. Needs workaround for trunkating.Di2015NewLine                    truncate_buffer = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (truncate_buffer) {Di2015NewLine                if (LineNumber < 0) {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("LineNumber not given. Cannot truncate xml buffer");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // Convert the buffer to a string using the encoding found before Di2015NewLine                // (or the default encoding).Di2015NewLine                string s = encoding.GetString(buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Seek to the line.Di2015NewLine                int char_index = 0;Di2015NewLine                while (--LineNumber > 0) {Di2015NewLine                    // Recognize \\r , \\n , \\r\\n as newlines...Di2015NewLine                    char_index = s.IndexOfAny(new char[] {'\\r', '\\n'}, char_index);Di2015NewLine                    // char_index should not be -1 because LineNumber>0, otherwise an RangeException is Di2015NewLine                    // thrown, which is appropriate.Di2015NewLine                    char_index++;Di2015NewLine                    if (s[char_index-1]=='\\r' && s.Length>char_index && s[char_index]=='\\n') {Di2015NewLine                        char_index++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                char_index += LinePosition - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var rgx = new System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex(xmlDocument.DocumentElement.Name + "[ \\r\\n\\t]*\\\\>");Di2015NewLine                System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match match = rgx.Match(s, char_index);Di2015NewLine                if (!match.Success || match.Index != char_index) {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("could not find EndElement to truncate the xml buffer.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                char_index += match.Value.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Convert the character offset back to the byte offset (for the given encoding).Di2015NewLine                int line1_boffset = encoding.GetByteCount(s.Substring(0, char_index));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // remove the bytes from the buffer.Di2015NewLine                buffer = buffer.Skip(line1_boffset).ToArray();Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                buffer = new byte[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2949866Di2015UniqueSeparator        IEnumerable<String> lexicalStrings = new List<String> { "test", "t" };Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<String> allLexicals = new List<String> { "test", "Test", "T", "t" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IEnumerable<String> lexicals = new List<String>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (String s in lexicalStrings)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lexicals = lexicals.Union(Di2015NewLine                allLexicals.Where(Di2015NewLine                lexical =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine                    return lexical == s;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in lexicals)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

2952979Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // sample dataDi2015NewLine        File.WriteAllText("my.data", @"4 6Di2015NewLine1 2 3 4 5 6Di2015NewLine2 5 4 3 21111 101Di2015NewLine3 5 6234 1 2 3Di2015NewLine4 2 33434 4 5 6");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Stream s = new BufferedStream(File.OpenRead("my.data")))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int rows = ReadInt32(s), cols = ReadInt32(s);Di2015NewLine            int[,] arr = new int[rows, cols];Di2015NewLine            for(int y = 0 ; y < rows ; y++)Di2015NewLine                for (int x = 0; x < cols; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    arr[y, x] = ReadInt32(s);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int ReadInt32(Stream s)Di2015NewLine    { // edited to improve handling of multiple spaces etcDi2015NewLine        int b;Di2015NewLine        // skip any preceedingDi2015NewLine        while ((b = s.ReadByte()) >= 0 && (b < '0' || b > '9')) {  }Di2015NewLine        if (b < 0) throw new EndOfStreamException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int result = b - '0';Di2015NewLine        while ((b = s.ReadByte()) >= '0' && b <= '9')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = result * 10 + (b - '0');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2957694Di2015UniqueSeparator<DataTemplate DataType="{x:Type local:ItemViewModel}">Di2015NewLine    <Rectangle Width="{Binding Width}" Height="{Binding Height}">Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        <!-- Make the left position of the item depend on the ActualWidth of the Canvas,Di2015NewLine             the relative Left position (between 0 and 1) from the ItemViewModel, and the ActualWidthDi2015NewLine             of the item itself. This is needed because the Canvas.Left property defines theDi2015NewLine             position of the left side, not the center. Therefore, we calculate the position ofDi2015NewLine             the center this way:Di2015NewLine                  (Canvas.ActualWidth * ItemViewModel.Left) - (Item.ActualWidth / 2)Di2015NewLine        -->Di2015NewLine        <Canvas.Left>Di2015NewLine            <MultiBinding>Di2015NewLine                <MultiBinding.Converter>Di2015NewLine                    <converters:ExpressionConverter Expression="{}({0} * {1}) - ({2} / 2)"/>Di2015NewLine                </MultiBinding.Converter>Di2015NewLine                <Binding Path="ActualWidth" RelativeSource="{RelativeSource FindAncestor, AncestorType={x:Type Canvas}}"/>Di2015NewLine                <Binding Path="Left"/>Di2015NewLine                <Binding Path="ActualWidth" RelativeSource="{RelativeSource Self}"/>Di2015NewLine            </MultiBinding>Di2015NewLine        </Canvas.Left>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        <!-- the top position of the items is determined the same way as the left positionDi2015NewLine             which is described above -->Di2015NewLine        <Canvas.Top>Di2015NewLine            <MultiBinding>Di2015NewLine                <MultiBinding.Converter>Di2015NewLine                    <converters:ExpressionConverter Expression="{}({0} * {1}) - ({2} / 2)"/>Di2015NewLine                </MultiBinding.Converter>Di2015NewLine                <Binding Path="ActualHeight" RelativeSource="{RelativeSource FindAncestor, AncestorType={x:Type Canvas}}"/>Di2015NewLine                <Binding Path="Top"/>Di2015NewLine                <Binding Path="ActualHeight" RelativeSource="{RelativeSource Self}"/>Di2015NewLine            </MultiBinding>Di2015NewLine        </Canvas.Top>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    </Rectangle>Di2015NewLine</DataTemplate>Di2015NewLine

2959827Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string CreateSQL(List<string> names)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    sb.Append("select city,count(*) from table where user in ('");Di2015NewLine    foreach ( var name in name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       sb.Append("'");Di2015NewLine       sb.Append(name);Di2015NewLine       sb.Append("',");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Remove(sb.Length-1,1); //remove trailing ,Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(") GROUP BY city");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2961305Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void procExit(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("YAY", "WOOT");Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine        // ProcessStatus is just a class I made up to demonstrate passing data back to the UIDi2015NewLine        processComplete(new ProcessStatus { Success = true });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void processComplete(ProcessStatus status)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We are in the wrong thread! 2969345Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap ConvertToBitmap(byte[] data, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine    for (int y=0; y < height; y++) {Di2015NewLine        for (int x=0; x < width; x++) {Di2015NewLine            int value = ReadPixelValue(data, x, y, width);Di2015NewLine            Color c = ConvertValToColor(value);Di2015NewLine            bm.SetPixel(x, y, c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return bm;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2969345Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic int ReadPixelValue(byte[] data, int x, int y, width)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int pixelsPerByte = 4;Di2015NewLine    // added the % pixelsPerByte to deal with width not being a multiple of pixelsPerByte,Di2015NewLine    // which won't happen in your case, but will in the general caseDi2015NewLine    int bytesPerLine = width / pixelsPerByte + (width % pixelsPerByte != 0 ? 1 : 0);Di2015NewLine    int index = y * bytesPerLine + (x / pixelsPerByte);Di2015NewLine    byte b = data[index];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int pixelIndex = (x % pixelsPerByte) * 2;Di2015NewLine    // if every 4 pixels are reversed, try this:Di2015NewLine    // int pixelIndex = 8 - (x % pixelsPerByte) * 2;Di2015NewLine    return ((int b) >> pixelIndex) & 0x3;        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2969345Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Color[] _colors = new Color[] { Color.Black, Color.Red, Color.Blue, Color.White };Di2015NewLinestatic Color ConvertValToColor(int val)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (val < 0 || val > _colors.Length)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("val");Di2015NewLine    return _colors[val];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2969558Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate readonly List<Type> _supportedTypes = new List<Type> ();Di2015NewLinepublic void RegisterSupportedType<T> () where T : SomeConstraintTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _supportedTypes.Add (typeof (T));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// if we do not know the type, but somehow know an index to typeDi2015NewLinepublic object Create (int supportedTypeIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object untyped = Activator.Di2015NewLine        CreateInstance (_supportedTypes[supportedTypeIndex]);Di2015NewLine    return untyped;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// if we know instance type\\subtype (eg interface) and know an indexDi2015NewLinepublic T Create<T> (int supportedTypeIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T typed = default (T);Di2015NewLine    object untyped = Create (supportedTypeIndex);Di2015NewLine    if (!(untyped is T))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // throw meaningful exception :)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    typed = (T)(untyped);Di2015NewLine    return typed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2969558Di2015UniqueSeparatorType
2969558Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConstrainedType<T> Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Type Type { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public ConstrainedType (Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // may have this backward, would have to fact check beforeDi2015NewLine        // rolling out to prod ;)Di2015NewLine        if (!typeof (T).IsAssignableFrom (type))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // throw meaningful exception!Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Type = type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<ConstrainedType<SomeTypeConstraint>> list = Di2015NewLine    new List<ConstrainedType<SomeTypeConstraint>> ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// will throw meaningful exception if MyClass is not Di2015NewLine// SomeTypeConstraint or a sub classDi2015NewLinelist.Add (new ConstrainedType (typeof (MyClass)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSomeTypeConstraint baseType = Di2015NewLine    (SomeTypeConstraint)(Activator.CreateInstance(list[0].Type));Di2015NewLine

2972533Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic XmlDocument CreateDocumentFromMarkup(string content)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(content))Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("'content' must have a value.", "content");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  RegexOptions options = RegexOptions.CultureInvariant | RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.IgnoreCase;Di2015NewLine  Regex tagExpr = new Regex("(?<tag><[^%/](?:.*?)>)", options);Di2015NewLine  Regex serverTagExpr = new Regex("<(?<tag>[a-z][a-z1-9]*):(?<type>[a-z][a-z1-9]*)", options);Di2015NewLine  Regex attributeExpr = new Regex("(?<name>\\\\S+)=[\\"']?(?<value>(?:.(?![\\"']?\\\\s+(?:\\\\S+)=|[>\\"']))+.)[\\"']?", options);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  XmlDocument document = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine  XmlElement root = document.CreateElement("controls");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Func<XmlDocument, string, string, XmlElement> creator = (document, name, value) => {Di2015NewLine    XmlElement element = document.CreateElement(name);Di2015NewLine    element.InnerText = value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return element;Di2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (Match tagMatch in tagExpr.Matches(content)) {Di2015NewLine    Match serverTagMatch = serverTagExpr.Match(tagMatch.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (serverTagMatch.Success) {Di2015NewLine      XmlElement controlElement = document.CreateElement("control");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      controlElement.AppendChild(Di2015NewLine        creator(document, "tag", serverTagMatch.Groups["tag"].Value));Di2015NewLine      controlElement.AppendChild(Di2015NewLine        creator(document, "type", serverTagMatch.Groups["type"].Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      XmlElement attributeElement = document.CreateElement("attributes");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      foreach (Match attributeMatch in attributeExpr.Matches(tagMatch.Value)) {Di2015NewLine        if (attributeMatch.Success) {Di2015NewLine          attributeElement.AppendChild(Di2015NewLine            creator(document, attributeMatch.Groups["name"].Value, attributeMatch.Groups["value"].Value));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      controlElement.AppendChild(attributeElement);Di2015NewLine      root.AppendChild(controlElement);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return document;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2975666Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string EncryptString(string stringToEncrypt, string encryptionKey)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string encrypted = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    byte[] key = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(encryptionKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RijndaelManaged RMCrypto = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine    RMCrypto.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, RMCrypto.CreateEncryptor(key, key), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] encryptedString = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(stringToEncrypt);Di2015NewLine    cs.Write(encryptedString, 0, encryptedString.Length);Di2015NewLine    cs.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine    cs.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //encrypted = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string DecryptString(string stringToDecrypt, string encryptionKey)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string decrypted = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    byte[] key = Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(encryptionKey);Di2015NewLine    byte[] data = Convert.FromBase64String(stringToDecrypt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RijndaelManaged RMCrypto = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine    RMCrypto.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, RMCrypto.CreateDecryptor(key, key), CryptoStreamMode.Write);Di2015NewLine    cs.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine    cs.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine    cs.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    decrypted = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return decrypted;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2979063Di2015UniqueSeparatorString.GetHashCode()
2979063Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass HashTable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<KeyValuePair<int, List<KeyValuePair<string, T>>>> _table = Di2015NewLine        new List<KeyValuePair<int, List<KeyValuePair<string, T>>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Set(string key, T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var hashcode = key.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        List<KeyValuePair<string, T>> l;Di2015NewLine        if(!_table.TryGetValue(hashcode, out l))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            l = new List<KeyValuePair<string, T>>();Di2015NewLine            _table.Add(hashcode, l);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T o;Di2015NewLine        if(l.TryGetValue(key, out o))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (o != value)Di2015NewLine                l.Single(x => x.Key == key).Value = o;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            l.Add(new KeyValuePair(key, value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T Get(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<KeyValuePair<string, T>> l;Di2015NewLine        object o;Di2015NewLine        if(!(_table.TryGetValue(hashcode, out l) && Di2015NewLine            !l.TryGetValue(key, out o)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("key");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return o;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2979063Di2015UniqueSeparatorTryGetValue
2979063Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool TryGetValue<TKey, TValue>(this List<KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue>> list, Di2015NewLine    TKey key, out TValue value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var query = list.Where(x => x.Key == key);        Di2015NewLine    value = query.SingleOrDefault().Value;Di2015NewLine    return query.Any();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2981241Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static long DirSize(string sourceDir, bool recurse)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long size = 0;Di2015NewLine        string[] fileEntries = Directory.GetFiles(sourceDir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string fileName in fileEntries)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Interlocked.Add(ref size, (new FileInfo(fileName)).Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (recurse)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] subdirEntries = Directory.GetDirectories(sourceDir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Parallel.For<long>(0, subdirEntries.Length, () => 0, (i, loop, subtotal) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if ((File.GetAttributes(subdirEntries[i]) & FileAttributes.ReparsePoint) != FileAttributes.ReparsePoint)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    subtotal += DirSize(subdirEntries[i], true);Di2015NewLine                    return subtotal;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine                (x) => Interlocked.Add(ref size, x)Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return size;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2984744Di2015UniqueSeparatorEqualityComparer<T>.Default
2984744Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass StaticPropertyTypeRecursiveEquality<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Func<T,T, bool> actualEquals;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static StaticPropertyTypeRecursiveEquality()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(IEquatable<T>).IsAssignableFrom(typeof(T)) || Di2015NewLine            typeof(T).IsValueType ||Di2015NewLine            typeof(T).Equals(typeof(object)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            actualEquals = Di2015NewLine                (t1,t2) => EqualityComparer<T>.Default.Equals(t1, t2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Func<T,T,bool>> recursionList = new List<Func<T,T,bool>>();Di2015NewLine            var getterGeneric = Di2015NewLine                typeof(StaticPropertyTypeRecursiveEquality<T>)Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod("MakePropertyGetter", Di2015NewLine                        BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Static);Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> properties = typeof(T)Di2015NewLine                .GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                .Where(p => p.CanRead);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var property in properties)                Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var specific = getterGenericDi2015NewLine                    .MakeGenericMethod(property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine                var parameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "t");Di2015NewLine                var getterExpression = Expression.Lambda(Di2015NewLine                    Expression.MakeMemberAccess(parameter, property),Di2015NewLine                    parameter);Di2015NewLine                recursionList.Add((Func<T,T,bool>)specific.Invoke(Di2015NewLine                    null, Di2015NewLine                    new object[] { getterExpression }));                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            actualEquals = (t1,t2) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var p in recursionList)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (t1 == null && t2 == null)Di2015NewLine                            return true;Di2015NewLine                        if (t1 == null || t2 == null)Di2015NewLine                            return false;Di2015NewLine                        if (!p(t1,t2))Di2015NewLine                            return false;                            Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Func<T,T,bool> MakePropertyGetter<TProperty>(Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<T,TProperty>> getValueExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var getValue = getValueExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLine        return (t1,t2) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return StaticPropertyTypeRecursiveEquality<TProperty>Di2015NewLine                    .Equals(getValue(t1), getValue(t2));Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool Equals(T t1, T t2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return actualEquals(t1,t2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2985425Di2015UniqueSeparator    private readonly static WindowsIdentity _identity = WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent();Di2015NewLine    protected static bool GetPermission(FileSystemRights right, string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileSecurity fs;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fs = System.IO.File.GetAccessControl(path);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(InvalidOperationException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // called on a disk that's not present, ...Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(UnauthorizedAccessException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach(FileSystemAccessRule fsar in fs.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(SecurityIdentifier)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(fsar.IdentityReference == _identity.User && fsar.FileSystemRights.HasFlag(right) && fsar.AccessControlType == AccessControlType.Allow)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if(_identity.Groups.Contains(fsar.IdentityReference) && fsar.FileSystemRights.HasFlag(right) && fsar.AccessControlType == AccessControlType.Allow)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

2985670Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void f(int t) // t is interval in secondsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   this.running = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   Stopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine   stopWatch.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   doDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       stopwatch.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Do work hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   } while (stopWatch.Elapsed.Seconds > t); // repeat if f() took longer than tDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   this.running = false;   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2985735Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring Sanitize(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (s == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    char[] buffer = new char[s.Length];Di2015NewLine    int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine    bool inSpace = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < s.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s[i] == ' ' || s[i] == '\\t' || s[i] == '\\r' || s[i] == '\\n')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!inSpace)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                buffer[pos] = ' ';Di2015NewLine                pos++;Di2015NewLine                inSpace = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            buffer[pos] = s[i];Di2015NewLine            pos++;Di2015NewLine            inSpace = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new string(buffer, 0, pos);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2986455Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static double GetRichTextBoxScrolPos(RichTextBox textBox)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(textBox1.TextLength == 0) return 0;Di2015NewLine    var p1 = textBox.GetPositionFromCharIndex(0);Di2015NewLine    var p2 = textBox.GetPositionFromCharIndex(textBox.TextLength - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int scrollPos = -p1.Y;Di2015NewLine    int maxScrolPos = p2.Y - p1.Y - textBox.ClientSize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(maxScrolPos <= 0) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double d = 100.0 * (double)scrollPos / (double)maxScrolPos;Di2015NewLine    if(d < 0) d = 0;Di2015NewLine    else if(d > 100) d = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return d;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2997060Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate  static Image resizeImage(Image imgToResize, Size size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int sourceWidth = imgToResize.Width;Di2015NewLine  int sourceHeight = imgToResize.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  float nPercent = 0;Di2015NewLine  float nPercentW = 0;Di2015NewLine  float nPercentH = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  nPercentW = ((float)size.Width / (float)sourceWidth);Di2015NewLine  nPercentH = ((float)size.Height / (float)sourceHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (nPercentH < nPercentW)Di2015NewLine    nPercent = nPercentH;Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    nPercent = nPercentW;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  int destWidth = (int)(sourceWidth * nPercent);Di2015NewLine  int destHeight = (int)(sourceHeight * nPercent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Bitmap b = new Bitmap(destWidth, destHeight);Di2015NewLine  Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage((Image)b);Di2015NewLine  g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  g.DrawImage(imgToResize, 0, 0, destWidth, destHeight);Di2015NewLine  g.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return (Image)b;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
2997157Di2015UniqueSeparatorWriteResourceToFile("Project_Namespace.Resources.filename_as_in_resources.extension", "extractedfile.txt");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void WriteResourceToFile(string resourceName, string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int bufferSize = 4096; // set 4KB bufferDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine    using (Stream input = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetManifestResourceStream(resourceName))Di2015NewLine    using (Stream output = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int byteCount = input.Read(buffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine        while (byteCount > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output.Write(buffer, 0, byteCount);Di2015NewLine            byteCount = input.Read(buffer, 0, bufferSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

2997952Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static UserContext Current Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    get Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        // If Session does not yet contain a UserContext instance ...Di2015NewLine        if (System.Web.HttpContext.Current.Session["UserContext"] == null) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            // ... then create and initialize a new UserContext instance ...Di2015NewLine            UserContext uc = new UserContext(); Di2015NewLine            uc.User = new User(); Di2015NewLine            // ... and store it in Session where it will be available forDi2015NewLine            // subsequent requests during the same session.Di2015NewLine            System.Web.HttpContext.Current.Session["UserContext"] = uc; Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        // By the time we get here, Session contains a UserContext instance,Di2015NewLine        // so return it.Di2015NewLine        return (UserContext)System.Web.HttpContext.Current.Session["UserContext"]; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

3002013Di2015UniqueSeparator<ListView x:Name="view" ItemsSource="{Binding Data}" /> Di2015NewLine<ComboBox x:Name="box"  ItemsSource="{Binding Data}"Di2015NewLine                        SelectionChanged="ScrollIntoView" /> Di2015NewLine
3002013Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ScrollIntoView(object sender, SelectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  view.ScrollToCenterOfView(box.SelectedItem);Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
3002013Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ItemsControlExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static void ScrollToCenterOfView(this ItemsControl itemsControl, object item)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Scroll immediately if possibleDi2015NewLine    if(!itemsControl.TryScrollToCenterOfView(item))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Otherwise wait until everything is loaded, then scrollDi2015NewLine      if(itemsControl is ListBox) ((ListBox)itemsControl).ScrollIntoView(item);Di2015NewLine      itemsControl.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(DispatcherPriority.Loaded, new Action(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          itemsControl.TryScrollToCenterOfView(item);Di2015NewLine        }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static bool TryScrollToCenterOfView(this ItemsControl itemsControl, object item)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Find the containerDi2015NewLine    var container = itemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator.ContainerFromItem(item) as UIElement;Di2015NewLine    if(container==null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find the ScrollContentPresenterDi2015NewLine    ScrollContentPresenter presenter = null;Di2015NewLine    for(Visual vis = container; vis!=null && vis!=itemsControl; vis = VisualTreeHelper.GetParent(vis) as Visual)Di2015NewLine      if((presenter = vis as ScrollContentPresenter)!=null)Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    if(presenter==null) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Find the IScrollInfoDi2015NewLine    var scrollInfo = Di2015NewLine        !presenter.CanContentScroll ? presenter :Di2015NewLine        presenter.Content as IScrollInfo ??Di2015NewLine        FirstVisualChild(presenter.Content as ItemsPresenter) as IScrollInfo ??Di2015NewLine        presenter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Compute the center point of the container relative to the scrollInfoDi2015NewLine    Size size = container.RenderSize;Di2015NewLine    Point center = container.TransformToAncestor((Visual)scrollInfo).Transform(new Point(size.Width/2, size.Height/2));Di2015NewLine    center.Y += scrollInfo.VerticalOffset;Di2015NewLine    center.X += scrollInfo.HorizontalOffset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Adjust for logical scrollingDi2015NewLine    if(scrollInfo is StackPanel || scrollInfo is VirtualizingStackPanel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      double logicalCenter = itemsControl.ItemContainerGenerator.IndexFromContainer(container) + 0.5;Di2015NewLine      Orientation orientation = scrollInfo is StackPanel ? ((StackPanel)scrollInfo).Orientation : ((VirtualizingStackPanel)scrollInfo).Orientation;Di2015NewLine      if(orientation==Orientation.Horizontal)Di2015NewLine        center.X = logicalCenter;Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine        center.Y = logicalCenter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Scroll the center of the container to the center of the viewportDi2015NewLine    if(scrollInfo.CanVerticallyScroll) scrollInfo.SetVerticalOffset(CenteringOffset(center.Y, scrollInfo.ViewportHeight, scrollInfo.ExtentHeight));Di2015NewLine    if(scrollInfo.CanHorizontallyScroll) scrollInfo.SetHorizontalOffset(CenteringOffset(center.X, scrollInfo.ViewportWidth, scrollInfo.ExtentWidth));Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static double CenteringOffset(double center, double viewport, double extent)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return Math.Min(extent - viewport, Math.Max(0, center - viewport/2));Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  private static DependencyObject FirstVisualChild(Visual visual)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if(visual==null) return null;Di2015NewLine    if(VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(visual)==0) return null;Di2015NewLine    return VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(visual, 0);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3004940Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Controls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WpfApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine public class CustomPanel : PanelDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// RequiredHeight Attached Dependency PropertyDi2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  public static readonly DependencyProperty RequiredHeightProperty = DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("RequiredHeight", typeof(double), typeof(CustomPanel), new FrameworkPropertyMetadata((double)double.NaN, FrameworkPropertyMetadataOptions.AffectsMeasure, new PropertyChangedCallback(OnRequiredHeightPropertyChanged)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private static void OnRequiredHeightPropertyChanged(DependencyObject obj, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static double GetRequiredHeight(DependencyObject d)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   return (double)d.GetValue(RequiredHeightProperty);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static void SetRequiredHeight(DependencyObject d, double value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   d.SetValue(RequiredHeightProperty, value);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private double m_ExtraSpace = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private double m_NormalSpace = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override Size MeasureOverride(Size availableSize)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   //Measure the children...Di2015NewLine   foreach (UIElement child in Children)Di2015NewLine    child.Measure(availableSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Sort them depending on their desired size...Di2015NewLine   var sortedChildren = Children.Cast<UIElement>().OrderBy<UIElement, double>(new Func<UIElement, double>(delegate(UIElement child)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine    return GetRequiredHeight(child);Di2015NewLine   }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Compute remaining space...Di2015NewLine   double remainingSpace = availableSize.Height;Di2015NewLine   m_NormalSpace = 0.0;Di2015NewLine   int remainingChildren = Children.Count;Di2015NewLine   foreach (UIElement child in sortedChildren)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine    m_NormalSpace = remainingSpace / remainingChildren;Di2015NewLine    double height = GetRequiredHeight(child);Di2015NewLine    if (height < m_NormalSpace) // if == there would be no point continuing as there would be no remaining spaceDi2015NewLine     remainingSpace -= height;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine     remainingSpace = 0;Di2015NewLine     break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    remainingChildren--;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //Dtermine the extra space to add to every child...Di2015NewLine   m_ExtraSpace = remainingSpace / Children.Count;Di2015NewLine   return Size.Empty;  //The panel should take all the available space...Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  protected override System.Windows.Size ArrangeOverride(System.Windows.Size finalSize)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine   double offset = 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   foreach (UIElement child in Children)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine    double height = GetRequiredHeight(child);Di2015NewLine    double value = (double.IsNaN(height) ? m_NormalSpace : Math.Min(height, m_NormalSpace)) + m_ExtraSpace;Di2015NewLine    child.Arrange(new Rect(0, offset, finalSize.Width, value));Di2015NewLine    offset += value;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return finalSize;   //The final size is the available size...Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3008675Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// adds an element to an xml tree and builds the tree up if it is neededDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="outerParent">root node</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="innerPath">root/childOne/innerParent/name</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="name">element to add</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="value">elements value</param>Di2015NewLinestatic XElement BuildTree(XElement outerParent, string innerParentPath, string name, object value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> s = innerParentPath.Split('/').ToList(); Di2015NewLine    string str = "";Di2015NewLine    XElement prevInner = null;Di2015NewLine    if (s.Count != 2)//use 2 since we know the root will always be thereDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var t = new List<string>(s);Di2015NewLine        t.RemoveRange(s.Count - 1, 1);//remove last elementDi2015NewLine        string[] sa = t.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        str = string.Join("/", sa);Di2015NewLine        prevInner = BuildTree(outerParent, str, name, value);//call recursively till we get to root;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        prevInner = outerParent;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    XElement inner = prevInner.Element(s[s.Count - 1]);Di2015NewLine    if (inner == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s[s.Count - 1] == name)//add actual element if we're at top lvl.Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            prevInner.Add(new XElement(name, value));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            inner = new XElement(s[s.Count - 1]);Di2015NewLine            prevInner.Add(inner);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return inner;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3008775Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> SplitByLength(this string str, int maxLength) {Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < str.Length; index += maxLength) {Di2015NewLine        yield return str.Substring(index, Math.Min(maxLength, str.Length - index));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3008775Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> SplitByLength(this string str, int maxLength) {Di2015NewLine    int index = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(true) {Di2015NewLine        if (index + maxLength >= str.Length) {Di2015NewLine            yield return str.Substring(index);Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return str.Substring(index, maxLength);Di2015NewLine        index += maxLength;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3008775Di2015UniqueSeparatorwhile(true)

3018338Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ReadSteamString(this BinaryReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // To hold the list of bytes making up the stringDi2015NewLine  List<byte> str = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine  byte nextByte = reader.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine  // Read up to and including the null terminator...Di2015NewLine  while (nextByte != 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // ...but don't include it in the stringDi2015NewLine    str.Add(nextByte);Di2015NewLine    nextByte = reader.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Interpret the result as a UTF-8 sequence      Di2015NewLine  return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(str.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3023194Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Configuration.Install;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MyInstallerClassDllDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine[RunInstaller(true)]Di2015NewLinepublic partial class MyInstallerClass : InstallerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const int ODBC_REMOVE_DSN = 3;Di2015NewLine    public MyInstallerClass()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Uninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary savedState)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RemoveSystemDSN();Di2015NewLine        base.Uninstall(savedState);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("ODBCCP32.dll", CallingConvention = CallingConvention.Winapi, CharSet = CharSet.Unicode, SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern int SQLConfigDataSource(int hwndParent, int fRequest, string lpszDriver, string lpszAttributes);Di2015NewLine    private void RemoveSystemDSN()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string vAttributes = "DSN=DSN Name" + Strings.Chr(0);Di2015NewLine        vAttributes += "Description=DSN Description" + Strings.Chr(0);Di2015NewLine        vAttributes += "Trusted_Connection=Yes" + Strings.Chr(0);Di2015NewLine        vAttributes += "Server=SQLINSTANCE" + Strings.Chr(0);Di2015NewLine        vAttributes += "Database=databasename" + Strings.Chr(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (SQLConfigDataSource(0, ODBC_REMOVE_DSN, "SQL Server", vAttributes) == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show("Failed to remove ODBC data source!!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

3023327Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class ExtController : ControllerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected static Dictionary<string, List<string>> RolesControllerDictionary;Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnActionExecuted(ActionExecutedContext filterContext)   Di2015NewLine    {   Di2015NewLine        // build list of menu items based on user's permissions, and add it to ViewData  Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<MenuItem> menu = BuildMenu();  Di2015NewLine        ViewData["Menu"] = menu;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<MenuItem> BuildMenu()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Code to build a menuDi2015NewLine        var dynamicMenu = new List<MenuItem>();Di2015NewLine        SomeRoleProvider rp = new SomeRoleProvider();Di2015NewLine        // ^^^^^INSERT DESIRED ROLE PROVIDER HERE^^^^^Di2015NewLine        rp.Initialize("", new NameValueCollection());Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {   // Get all roles for user from RoleProviderDi2015NewLine            foreach (var role in rp.GetRolesForUser(HttpContext.User.Identity.Name))Di2015NewLine            {   // Check if role is in dictionaryDi2015NewLine                if (RolesControllerDictionary.Keys.Contains(role))Di2015NewLine                {   Di2015NewLine                    var controllerList = RolesControllerDictionary[role];Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var controller in controllerList)Di2015NewLine                    {   // Add controller to menu only if it is not already addedDi2015NewLine                        if (dynamicMenu.Any(x => x.Text == controller))Di2015NewLine                        { continue; }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        { dynamicMenu.Add(new MenuItem(controller)); }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch { }   // Most role providers can throw exceptions. Insert Log4NET or equiv here.   Di2015NewLine        return dynamicMenu; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ExtController()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check if ControllerRolesDictionary is non-existantDi2015NewLine        if (RolesControllerDictionary == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            RolesControllerDictionary = new Dictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLine            // If so, use Reflection to add List of all Roles associated with ControllersDi2015NewLine            const bool allInherited = true;Di2015NewLine            const string CONTROLLER = "Controller";Di2015NewLine            var myAssembly = System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get List of all Controllers with [Authorize] attributeDi2015NewLine            var controllerList = from type in myAssembly.GetTypes()Di2015NewLine                                 where type.Name.Contains(CONTROLLER)Di2015NewLine                                 where !type.IsAbstractDi2015NewLine                                 let attribs = type.GetCustomAttributes(allInherited)Di2015NewLine                                 where attribs.Any(x => x.GetType().Equals(typeof(AuthorizeAttribute)))Di2015NewLine                                 select type;Di2015NewLine            // Loop over all controllersDi2015NewLine            foreach (var controller in controllerList)Di2015NewLine            {   // Find first instance of [Authorize] attributeDi2015NewLine                var attrib = controller.GetCustomAttributes(allInherited).First(x => x.GetType().Equals(typeof(AuthorizeAttribute))) as AuthorizeAttribute;Di2015NewLine                foreach (var role in attrib.Roles.Split(',').AsEnumerable())Di2015NewLine                {   // If there are Roles associated with [Authorize] iterate over themDi2015NewLine                    if (!RolesControllerDictionary.ContainsKey(role))Di2015NewLine                    { RolesControllerDictionary[role] = new List<string>(); }Di2015NewLine                    // Add controller to List of 3024112Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class RuntimeCodeCompilerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static volatile Dictionary<string, Assembly> cache = new Dictionary<string, Assembly>();Di2015NewLine    private static object syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLine    static Dictionary<string, Assembly> assemblies = new Dictionary<string, Assembly>();Di2015NewLine    static RuntimeCodeCompiler()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyLoad += (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            assemblies[e.LoadedAssembly.FullName] = e.LoadedAssembly;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        AppDomain.CurrentDomain.AssemblyResolve += (sender, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Assembly assembly = null;Di2015NewLine            assemblies.TryGetValue(e.Name, out assembly);Di2015NewLine            return assembly;Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Assembly CompileCode(string code)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider provider = new CSharpCodeProvider();Di2015NewLine        ICodeCompiler compiler = provider.CreateCompiler();Di2015NewLine        CompilerParameters compilerparams = new CompilerParameters();Di2015NewLine        compilerparams.GenerateExecutable = false;Di2015NewLine        compilerparams.GenerateInMemory = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Assembly assembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string location = assembly.Location;Di2015NewLine                if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(location))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    compilerparams.ReferencedAssemblies.Add(location);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (NotSupportedException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // this happens for dynamic assemblies, so just ignore it. Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CompilerResults results =Di2015NewLine           compiler.CompileAssemblyFromSource(compilerparams, code);Di2015NewLine        if (results.Errors.HasErrors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder errors = new StringBuilder("Compiler Errors :\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine            foreach (CompilerError error in results.Errors)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                errors.AppendFormat("Line {0},{1}\\t: {2}\\n",Di2015NewLine                       error.Line, error.Column, error.ErrorText);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(errors.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            AppDomain.CurrentDomain.Load(results.CompiledAssembly.GetName());Di2015NewLine            return results.CompiledAssembly;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Assembly CompileCodeOrGetFromCache(string code,  string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool exists = cache.ContainsKey(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!exists)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                exists = cache.ContainsKey(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!exists)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cache.Add(key, CompileCode(code));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return cache[key];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

3026143Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int ChoosePage()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] weights = new int[] { 3, 5, 2 };Di2015NewLine    int sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    int i;Di2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < weights.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        sum += weights[i];Di2015NewLine    int selection = (new Random()).Next(sum);Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (i = 0; i < weights.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        count += weights[i];Di2015NewLine        if (selection < count)Di2015NewLine            return i;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return weights.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3026236Di2015UniqueSeparatorcombos = (array containing 3-long combination of candidates)Di2015NewLinefor each combo in combos                 # iterate through every comboDi2015NewLine  matches = new array                    # initialize a blank arrayDi2015NewLine  for each cell in unitDi2015NewLine    if (cell does not contain candidates other than the ones in your current combo)Di2015NewLine      matches.add(cell)                  # this is a match!Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLine  endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if matches.size >= 3                   # naked triple found! 3031657Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string Translate(string input, string from, string to)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (char ch in input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = from.IndexOf(ch);Di2015NewLine        if (i < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(ch);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (i < to.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(to[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3034394Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void QuoteString(this string value, StringBuilder b) {Di2015NewLine    if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(value))Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var b = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < value.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        char c = value[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Append the unhandled characters (that do not require special treament)Di2015NewLine        // to the string builder when special characters are detected.Di2015NewLine        if (c == '\\r' || c == '\\t' || c == '\\"' || c == '\\'' || c == '<' || c == '>' ||Di2015NewLine            c == '\\\\' || c == '\\n' || c == '\\b' || c == '\\f' || c < ' ') {Di2015NewLine            if (b == null) {Di2015NewLine                b = new StringBuilder(value.Length + 5);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (count > 0) {Di2015NewLine                b.Append(value, startIndex, count);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            startIndex = i + 1;Di2015NewLine            count = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (c) {Di2015NewLine            case '\\r':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\r");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\t':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\t");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\"':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\\\"");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\\\':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\\\\\");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\n':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\n");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\b':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\b");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\f':Di2015NewLine                b.Append("\\\\f");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\'':Di2015NewLine            case '>':Di2015NewLine            case '<':Di2015NewLine                AppendCharAsUnicode(b, c);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                if (c < ' ') {Di2015NewLine                    AppendCharAsUnicode(b, c);Di2015NewLine                } else {Di2015NewLine                    count++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (b == null) {Di2015NewLine        b.Append(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (count > 0) {Di2015NewLine        b.Append(value, startIndex, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return b.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3035616Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Shared Sub SetupDatabase()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' basic configurationDi2015NewLine    Dim infile As String = "..\\..\\..\\MyProject\\initial_db.sql"Di2015NewLine    Dim mysql_binary As String = "mysql.exe"Di2015NewLine    Dim mysql_args As String = String.Format("-h {0} -u{1} -p{2} {3}", HostName, UserName, Password, Schema)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' Creates a StreamReader from infileDi2015NewLine    Dim reader As New StreamReader(infile)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' Create the processDi2015NewLine    Dim p As New Process()Di2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.FileName = mysql_binaryDi2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.Arguments = mysql_argsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' Redirect input/output/stderrDi2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = TrueDi2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardError = TrueDi2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.RedirectStandardInput = TrueDi2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = FalseDi2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.CreateNoWindow = TrueDi2015NewLine    p.StartInfo.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.HiddenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' start the processDi2015NewLine    p.Start()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' read from infile and pass it to mysqlDi2015NewLine    Do While reader.EndOfStream = FalseDi2015NewLine        p.StandardInput.WriteLine(reader.ReadLine)Di2015NewLine    LoopDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' close stdinDi2015NewLine    p.StandardInput.Close()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' read from stdout / stderrDi2015NewLine    Dim stdout As String = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd()Di2015NewLine    Dim stderr As String = p.StandardError.ReadToEnd()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' wait for mysql to stopDi2015NewLine    p.WaitForExit()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ' if exitcode != 0 we raise an exception and include the output from stderrDi2015NewLine    If p.ExitCode <> 0 ThenDi2015NewLine        Throw New Exception("Initial DB Setup failed with Exitcode " & p.ExitCode & ":" & vbNewLine & stderr)Di2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    p.Close()Di2015NewLine    reader.Close()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

3037177Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Dictionary<Type, Dictionary<Enum, string>> enumMaps = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GetDescription(Enum value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type eType = value.GetType();Di2015NewLine    if (enumMaps == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        enumMaps = new Dictionary<Type, Dictionary<Enum, string>> ();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<Enum, string> map;Di2015NewLine    if (enumMaps.ContainsKey(eType))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        map = enumMaps[eType];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        map = new Dictionary<Enum, string>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (Enum e in Enum.GetValues(eType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo fi = eType.GetField(e.ToString());Di2015NewLine            DescriptionAttribute[] attributes = (DescriptionAttribute[])fi.GetCustomAttributes(Di2015NewLine                typeof(DescriptionAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine            map[e] = (attributes.Length > 0) ? attributes[0].Description : e.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        enumMaps[eType] = map;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return map[value];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3038602Di2015UniqueSeparatorGC.SuppressFinalize(this);
3038602Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MyResource : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [...]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This destructor will run only if the Dispose method Di2015NewLine    // does not get called.Di2015NewLine    ~MyResource()      Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do not re-create Dispose clean-up code here.Di2015NewLine        // Calling Dispose(false) is optimal in terms ofDi2015NewLine        // readability and maintainability.Di2015NewLine        Dispose(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Implement IDisposable.Di2015NewLine    // Do not make this method virtual.Di2015NewLine    // A derived class should not be able to override this method.Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        // This object will be cleaned up by the Dispose method.Di2015NewLine        // Therefore, you should call GC.SupressFinalize toDi2015NewLine        // take this object off the finalization queue Di2015NewLine        // and prevent finalization code for this objectDi2015NewLine        // from executing a second time.Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check to see if Dispose has already been called.Di2015NewLine        if(!this.disposed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If disposing equals true, dispose all managed Di2015NewLine            // and unmanaged resources.Di2015NewLine            if(disposing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Dispose managed resources.Di2015NewLine                component.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Call the appropriate methods to clean up Di2015NewLine            // unmanaged resources here.Di2015NewLine            resource.Cleanup()          Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        disposed = true;         Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3038778Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO.IsolatedStorage;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class IsolatedStorageFileExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Recursively gets a list of all files in isolated storageDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Based on <see cref="http://dotnetperls.com/recursively-find-files"/></remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="isolatedStorageFile"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static List<string> GetAllFilePaths(this IsolatedStorageFile isolatedStorageFile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Store results in the file results listDi2015NewLine        List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Store a stack of our directoriesDi2015NewLine        Stack<string> stack = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add initial directoryDi2015NewLine        string initialDirectory = "*";Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(initialDirectory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Continue while there are directories to processDi2015NewLine        while (stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get top directoryDi2015NewLine            string dir = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string directoryPath;Di2015NewLine            if (dir == "*")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                directoryPath = "*";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                directoryPath = dir + @"\\*";Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add all files at this directory to the result ListDi2015NewLine            var filesInCurrentDirectory = isolatedStorageFile.GetFileNames(directoryPath).ToList<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<string> filesInCurrentDirectoryWithFolderName = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Prefix the filename with the directory nameDi2015NewLine            foreach (string file in filesInCurrentDirectory)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                filesInCurrentDirectoryWithFolderName.Add(Path.Combine(dir, file));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result.AddRange(filesInCurrentDirectoryWithFolderName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add all directories at this directoryDi2015NewLine            foreach (string directoryName in isolatedStorageFile.GetDirectoryNames(directoryPath))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stack.Push(directoryName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3041153Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void AddWatermark(string filename, string watermarkText, Stream outputStream) {Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bitmap = Bitmap.FromFile(filename);Di2015NewLine    Font font = new Font("Arial", 20, FontStyle.Bold, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine    Color color = Color.FromArgb(10, 0, 0, 0); //Adds a black watermark with a low alpha value (almost transparent).Di2015NewLine    Point atPoint = new Point(100, 100); //The pixel point to draw the watermark at (this example puts it at 100, 100 (x, y)).Di2015NewLine    SolidBrush brush = new SolidBrush(color);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Graphics graphics = null;Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        graphics = Graphics.FromImage(bitmap);Di2015NewLine    } catch {Di2015NewLine        Bitmap temp = bitmap;Di2015NewLine        bitmap = new Bitmap(bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height);Di2015NewLine        graphics = Graphics.FromImage(bitmap);Di2015NewLine        graphics.DrawImage(temp, new Rectangle(0, 0, bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height), 0, 0, bitmap.Width, bitmap.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine        temp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    graphics.DrawString(text, font, brush, atPoint);Di2015NewLine    graphics.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bitmap.Save(outputStream);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3041267Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary> (1) Creates a 'Resource' pack URI .</summary>Di2015NewLine    public static Uri CreatePackUri(Assembly assembly, string path, PackType packType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Check.RequireNotNull(assembly);Di2015NewLine        Check.RequireStringValue(path, "path");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string startString = "pack://application:,,,/{0};component/{1}";Di2015NewLine        string packString;Di2015NewLine        switch (packType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public TeliaModem(System.Windows.Forms.Control mainThreadOwnder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _mainThreadOwnder =
