}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void SendSmsNow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OutboundSMS sms = _outSmses.Peek();Di2015NewLine            sms.Attempt++;Di2015NewLine            if (sms.Attempt > sms.MaxTries)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Error, "Failure to send after " + sms.MaxTries + " tries");Di2015NewLine                _outSmses.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Info, "Sending SMS: " + sms.ToString());Di2015NewLine            WriteToModem("AT+CMGS=\\"" + sms.Destination + "\\"\\r");Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(500);Di2015NewLine            WriteToModem(sms.Text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[1];Di2015NewLine            buffer[0] = 26; // ^ZDi2015NewLine            modemPort.Write(buffer, offset:0, count:1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            CurrentModemState = ModemState.SendingSMS;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UninitModem();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void HeartBeat()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (CurrentModemState == ModemState.NotInitialized)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TryInitModem();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (IsTransitionalState(CurrentModemState) && ModemStateTimeouter.IsTimedOut())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Error, "Modem error. Timed out during " + CurrentModemState);Di2015NewLine                CurrentModemState = ModemState.Error;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (CurrentModemState == ModemState.Idle && _lastModemKeepAlive.IsTimedOut())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Send keepaliveDi2015NewLine                WriteToModem("AT\\r");Di2015NewLine                CurrentModemState = ModemState.KeepAliveAwaitingResponse;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (CurrentModemState == ModemState.Error)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Debug, "Reenumerating modem...");Di2015NewLine                UninitModem();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_outSmses.Count != 0 && CurrentModemState == ModemState.Idle)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SendSmsNow();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string pendingData;Di2015NewLine        private void OnDataReceived()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Called in the main threadDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string nowWhat = modemPort.ReadExisting();Di2015NewLine            pendingData += nowWhat;Di2015NewLine            string[] lines = pendingData.Split(new string[] { "\\r\\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);Di2015NewLine            if (lines.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pendingData = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pendingData = lines[lines.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This happens in main thread.Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string line = lines[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (line.Length >= 5 && line.Substring(0, 5) == "+CMT:")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // s+= read one more lineDi2015NewLine                    if (i == lines.Length - 1) // no next lineDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        pendingData = line + "\\r\\n" + pendingData; // unread the lineDi2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    string line2 = lines[++i];Di2015NewLine                    NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Debug, "RX " + line);Di2015NewLine                    NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Debug, "RX " + line2);Di2015NewLine                    InboundSMS sms = new InboundSMS();Di2015NewLine                    sms.ParseCMT(line, line2);Di2015NewLine                    if(OnNewSMS != null)Di2015NewLine                        OnNewSMS(sms);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else   // Not a compositeDi2015NewLine                    NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Debug, "RX " + line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (line == "OK")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    OnModemResponse(true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (line == "ERROR")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    OnModemResponse(false);Di2015NewLine                    NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Error, "Modem error");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ProcessSmsResult(bool ok)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!ok)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                OutboundSMS sms = _outSmses.Peek();Di2015NewLine                if (sms.Attempt < sms.MaxTries)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Info, "Retrying sms...");Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Error, "Failed to send SMS: " + sms.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _outSmses.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnModemResponse(bool ok)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (CurrentModemState == ModemState.SendingSMS)Di2015NewLine                ProcessSmsResult(ok);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!ok)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Error, "Error during state " + CurrentModemState.ToString());Di2015NewLine                CurrentModemState = ModemState.Error;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (CurrentModemState)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case ModemState.NotInitialized:Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case ModemState.PowerUp:Di2015NewLine                    WriteToModem("ATE0;+CMGF=1;+CSCS=\\"IRA\\";+CNMI=1,2\\r");Di2015NewLine                    CurrentModemState = ModemState.Initializing;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case ModemState.Initializing:Di2015NewLine                case ModemState.SendingSMS:Di2015NewLine                case ModemState.KeepAliveAwaitingResponse:Di2015NewLine                    CurrentModemState = ModemState.Idle;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void CloseU9TelitNativeApp()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool doneSomething;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                doneSomething = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Process[] processes = Process.GetProcessesByName("wirelesscard");Di2015NewLine                foreach (Process p in processes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    p.CloseMainWindow();Di2015NewLine                    doneSomething = true;Di2015NewLine                    NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Info, "Killed native U9 app");Di2015NewLine                    System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(1000); // Will not wait if no native app is startedDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } while (doneSomething);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void WriteToModem(string s)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            modemPort.Write(s);Di2015NewLine            NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Debug, "TX " + s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void UninitModem()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (modemPort != null)Di2015NewLine                modemPort.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            modemPort = null;Di2015NewLine            CurrentModemState = ModemState.NotInitialized;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool IsTransitionalState(ModemState ms)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ms == ModemState.InitializingDi2015NewLine                || ms == ModemState.SendingSMSDi2015NewLine                || ms == ModemState.PowerUpDi2015NewLine                || ms == ModemState.KeepAliveAwaitingResponse;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Timeouter _initFailureTimeout = Di2015NewLine            new Timeouter(timeout_s: 10, autoReset:false, timedOut:true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void TryInitModem()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Try pistoning the modem with higher frequency. This does no harm (such as redundant logging)Di2015NewLine            PrepareU9Modem();   // Will do nothing if modem is okayDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!_initFailureTimeout.IsTimedOut())Di2015NewLine                return; // Don't try too frequentlyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (modemPort != null)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const string modemPortName = "Basecom HS-USB NMEA 9000";Di2015NewLine            const int speed = 115200;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string portName = Hardware.Misc.SerialPortFromFriendlyName(modemPortName);Di2015NewLine            if (portName == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Error, "Modem not found (yet). ");Di2015NewLine                _initFailureTimeout.Reset();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Info, string.Format("Found modem port \\"{0}\\" at {1}", modemPortName, portName));Di2015NewLine            modemPort = new System.IO.Ports.SerialPort(portName, speed);Di2015NewLine            modemPort.ReadTimeout = 3000;Di2015NewLine            modemPort.NewLine = "\\r\\n";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            modemPort.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            modemPort.DiscardInBuffer();Di2015NewLine            modemPort.DataReceived += new System.IO.Ports.SerialDataReceivedEventHandler(delegate { _mainThreadOwnder.Invoke(dataReceivedDelegate); });  // called in different thread!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _lastModemKeepAlive = new Timeouter(60, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WriteToModem("AT+CFUN=1\\r");Di2015NewLine            CurrentModemState = ModemState.PowerUp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void CheatU9Telit()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // U9 telit appears as USB CDrom on the bus, until disk eject is sent.Di2015NewLine            // Then, it reappears as normal stuff.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            VolumeDeviceClass volumeDeviceClass = new VolumeDeviceClass();Di2015NewLine            foreach (Volume device in volumeDeviceClass.Devices)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (device.FriendlyName == "PCL HSUPA Modem USB Device")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    NihLog.Write(NihLog.Level.Info, "Trying to initialize: " + device.FriendlyName);Di2015NewLine                    device.EjectCDRomNoUI();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void PrepareU9Modem()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CloseU9TelitNativeApp(); // Closes the autorun native appDi2015NewLine            CheatU9Telit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class OutboundSMSDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Destination;Di2015NewLine        public string Text;Di2015NewLine        public int MaxTries;Di2015NewLine        public int Attempt = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public OutboundSMS(string dest, string txt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Destination = dest;Di2015NewLine            Text = txt;Di2015NewLine            MaxTries = 3;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        override public string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(Attempt > 1)Di2015NewLine                return string.Format("\\"{0}\\" to {1}, attempt {2}", Di2015NewLine                    Text, Destination, Attempt);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return string.Format("\\"{0}\\" to {1}",Di2015NewLine                    Text, Destination);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class InboundSMSDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string SourcePhone;Di2015NewLine        public DateTime ReceiveTime;Di2015NewLine        public string Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void ParseCMT(string line1, string line2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] fields = line1.Split(new char[] { ',', ' ', '/', ':', '"' });Di2015NewLine            if (fields.Length < 12)Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException("CMT message too short. Expected 2 fields");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SourcePhone = fields[3];Di2015NewLine            ReceiveTime = DateTime.Parse("20" + fields[7] + "-" + fields[8] + "-" + fields[9] + " " + fields[10] + ":" + fields[11] + ":" + fields[12].Substring(0, 2));   //test carefullyDi2015NewLine            Text = line2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3042830Di2015UniqueSeparatorHardware.TeliaModem _modem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Form1()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _modem = new Hardware.TeliaModem(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    _modem.OnNewSMS += new Hardware.TeliaModem.NewSmsHandler(ProcessNewSMS);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _timer.Interval = 1000; // millisecondsDi2015NewLine        _timer.Tick += new EventHandler(OnTimerTick);Di2015NewLine        _timer.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3042830Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace UtilsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class StopWatchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        protected DateTime _resetTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public StopWatch() { Reset(); }Di2015NewLine        public void Reset() { _resetTime = DateTime.Now; }Di2015NewLine        public double TotalSeconds { get { return (DateTime.Now - _resetTime).TotalSeconds; } }Di2015NewLine        public TimeSpan Time { get { return DateTime.Now - _resetTime; } }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Timeouter : StopWatchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private bool _autoReset;Di2015NewLine        private double _timeout_s;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Timeouter(double timeout_s, bool autoReset, bool timedOut = false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _timeout_s = timeout_s;Di2015NewLine            _autoReset = autoReset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (timedOut)Di2015NewLine                _resetTime -= TimeSpan.FromSeconds(_timeout_s + 1);  // This is surely timed out, as requestedDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsTimedOut()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_timeout_s == double.PositiveInfinity)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool timedout = this.TotalSeconds >= _timeout_s;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (timedout && _autoReset)Di2015NewLine                Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return timedout;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Reset(double timeout_s) { _timeout_s = timeout_s; Reset(); }Di2015NewLine        public double TimeLeft { get { return _timeout_s - TotalSeconds; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3046102Di2015UniqueSeparator       public T GetByPrimaryKey<T>(int id) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)_db.GetObjectByKey(new EntityKey(_db.DefaultContainerName + "." + this.GetEntityName<T>(), GetPrimaryKeyInfo<T>().Name, id));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine        string GetEntityName<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            string name = typeof(T).Name;Di2015NewLine            if (name.ToLower() == "person")Di2015NewLine                return "People";Di2015NewLine            else if (name.Substring(name.Length - 1, 1).ToLower() == "y")Di2015NewLine                return name.Remove(name.Length - 1, 1) + "ies";Di2015NewLine            else if (name.Substring(name.Length - 1, 1).ToLower() == "s")Di2015NewLine                return name + "es";Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return name + "s";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private PropertyInfo GetPrimaryKeyInfo<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] properties = typeof(T).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo pI in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Object[] attributes = pI.GetCustomAttributes(true);Di2015NewLine            foreach (object attribute in attributes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (attribute is EdmScalarPropertyAttribute)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if ((attribute as EdmScalarPropertyAttribute).EntityKeyProperty == true)Di2015NewLine                        return pI;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (attribute is ColumnAttribute)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if ((attribute as ColumnAttribute).IsPrimaryKey == true)Di2015NewLine                        return pI;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3046751Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Play UpdatePlay()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (RepositoryContext context = new RepositoryContext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HttpRequest http = new HttpRequest();Di2015NewLine        PlayRepository rep = new PlayRepository(context);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ActorRepository actRep = new ActorRepository(context);Di2015NewLine    ReviewsRepository revRep = new ReviewsRepository(context);Di2015NewLine        TheatreRepository insRep = new TheatreRepository(context);Di2015NewLine        PartRepository partRep = new PartRepository(context);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Parser p = new Parser();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        XDocument doc = http.GetPlayInfo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Theatre theatre = p.ParseTheatreInfo(doc);Di2015NewLine        List<Actor> actors = p.ParseActorInfo(doc);Di2015NewLine        List<PlayReviews> playReviews = p.ParseReviewsInfo(doc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < actors.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            actors[i] = actRep.AddOrUpdate(actors[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < playReviews.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            playReviews[i].Reviews = revRep.AddOrUpdate(playReviews[i].Reviews);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        theatre = insRep.AddOrUpdate(theatre);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Play play = p.ParsePlayInfo(doc);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<Part> parts = GetParts(play);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < parts.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<Actor> lec = (List<Actor>)parts[i].Actors;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < lec.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lec[j] = actRep.AddOrUpdate(lec[j]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        play = rep.AddOrUpdate(play);Di2015NewLine        context.LoadProperty(play, o => o.Theatre);Di2015NewLine        context.LoadProperty(play, o => o.Actors);Di2015NewLine        context.LoadProperty(play, o => o.PlayReviewss);Di2015NewLine        context.LoadProperty(play, o => o.Parts);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rep.Save();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (play.Theatre != theatre)Di2015NewLine            play.Theatre = theatre;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        play = rep.AddParts(parts, play);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        play = rep.AddActor(actors, play);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < playReviews.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            playReviews[i].Play = play;Di2015NewLine            playReviews[i] = revRep.AddPlayInformation(playReviews[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rep.Save();Di2015NewLine        return play;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3046751Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Actor AddOrUpdate(Actor entity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Actor cur = context.Actors.Where(l => l.Name == entity.Name && l.Last_Name == entity.Last_Name).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    if (cur == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        context.Actors.AddObject(entity);Di2015NewLine        return entity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!entity.Mail.IsNullOrEmptyOrWhitespace() && cur.Mail != entity.Mail)Di2015NewLine            cur.Mail = entity.Mail;Di2015NewLine    //there are more of these...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return cur;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3047225Di2015UniqueSeparator// iterate cyclicly from 0 to 26^3 - 1Di2015NewLineint incrementValue(int i) {Di2015NewLine    // a verbose way of writing "return (i + 1) % 26^3"Di2015NewLine    i++;Di2015NewLine    if (i == 26*26*26) i = 0;Di2015NewLine    return i;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// convert 0 to AAA, 1 to AAB, ...Di2015NewLinestring formatValue(int i) {Di2015NewLine    var result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result.Insert(0, (char)('A' + (i % 26)));Di2015NewLine    i /= 26;Di2015NewLine    result.Insert(0, (char)('A' + (i % 26)));Di2015NewLine    i /= 26;Di2015NewLine    result.Insert(0, (char)('A' + (i % 26)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3049904Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string GetPath<T>(Expression<Func<T, object>> expr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemberExpression me;Di2015NewLine    switch (expr.Body.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Convert:Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.ConvertChecked:Di2015NewLine            var ue = expr.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            me = ((ue != null) ? ue.Operand : null) as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            me = expr.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (me != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stack.Push(me.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine        me = me.Expression as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return string.Join(".", stack.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3054309Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static  void CopyAll(DirectoryInfo source, DirectoryInfo target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Check if the target directory exists, if not, create it.Di2015NewLine    if (Directory.Exists(target.FullName) == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Directory.CreateDirectory(target.FullName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy each file into its new directory.Di2015NewLine    foreach (FileInfo fi in source.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(@?Copying {0}\\{1}?, target.FullName, fi.Name);Di2015NewLine        fi.CopyTo(Path.Combine(target.ToString(), fi.Name), true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Copy each subdirectory using recursion.Di2015NewLine    foreach (DirectoryInfo diSourceSubDir in source.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DirectoryInfo nextTargetSubDir =Di2015NewLine            target.CreateSubdirectory(diSourceSubDir.Name);Di2015NewLine        CopyAll(diSourceSubDir, nextTargetSubDir);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3054309Di2015UniqueSeparator    static public void CopyFolder( string sourceFolder, string destFolder )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Directory.Exists( destFolder ))Di2015NewLine            Directory.CreateDirectory( destFolder );Di2015NewLine        string[] files = Directory.GetFiles( sourceFolder );Di2015NewLine        foreach (string file in files)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string name = Path.GetFileName( file );Di2015NewLine            string dest = Path.Combine( destFolder, name );Di2015NewLine            File.Copy( file, dest );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string[] folders = Directory.GetDirectories( sourceFolder );Di2015NewLine        foreach (string folder in folders)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           string name = Path.GetFileName( folder );Di2015NewLine           string dest = Path.Combine( destFolder, name );Di2015NewLine            CopyFolder( folder, dest );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3055445Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DateTimeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string ToAgeString(this DateTime dob)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime dt = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int days = dt.Day - dob.Day;Di2015NewLine        if (days < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dt = dt.AddMonths(-1);Di2015NewLine            days += DateTime.DaysInMonth(dt.Year, dt.Month);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int months = dt.Month - dob.Month;Di2015NewLine        if (months < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dt = dt.AddYears(-1);Di2015NewLine            months += 12;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int years = dt.Year - dob.Year;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0} year{1}, {2} month{3} and {4} day{5}",Di2015NewLine                             years, (years == 1) ? "" : "s",Di2015NewLine                             months, (months == 1) ? "" : "s",Di2015NewLine                             days, (days == 1) ? "" : "s");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3055797Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Heap<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Heap(int limit, IComparer<T> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.comparer = comparer;Di2015NewLine        data = new T[limit];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    T[] data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        data[count++] = t;Di2015NewLine        promote(count-1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IComparer<T> comparer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Count { get { return count; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Pop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T result = data[0];Di2015NewLine        fill(0);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool less(T a, T b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return comparer.Compare(a,b)<0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void fill(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int child1 = index*2+1;Di2015NewLine        int child2 = index*2+2;Di2015NewLine        if(child1 >= Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data[index] = data[--count];Di2015NewLine            if(index!=count)Di2015NewLine                promote(index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int bestChild = child1;Di2015NewLine            if(child2 < Count && less(data[child2], data[child1]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bestChild = child2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            data[index] = data[bestChild];Di2015NewLine            fill(bestChild);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void promote(int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(index==0)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        int parent = (index-1)/2;Di2015NewLine        if(less(data[index], data[parent]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T tmp = data[parent];Di2015NewLine            data[parent] = data[index];Di2015NewLine            data[index] = tmp;Di2015NewLine            promote(parent);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestruct ArrayCursor<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T [] Array {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public int Index {get;set;}Di2015NewLine    public bool Finished {get{return Array.Length == Index;}}Di2015NewLine    public T Value{get{return Array[Index];}}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass this.comparer = comparer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare (ArrayCursor<T> a, ArrayCursor<T> b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return comparer.Compare(a.Value, b.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class HeapMergerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> MergeUnique<T>(this T[][] arrays)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool first = true;Di2015NewLine        T last = default(T);Di2015NewLine        IEqualityComparer<T> eq = EqualityComparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine        foreach(T i in Merge(arrays))Di2015NewLine            if(first || !eq.Equals(last,i))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return i;Di2015NewLine                last = i;Di2015NewLine                first = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> Merge<T>(this T[][] arrays)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var map = new Heap<ArrayCursor<T>>(arrays.Length, new ArrayComparer<T>(Comparer<T>.Default));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<ArrayCursor<T>> tryAdd = (a)=>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(!a.Finished)Di2015NewLine                map.Add(a);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i=0;i<arrays.Length;i++)Di2015NewLine            tryAdd(new ArrayCursor<T>{Array=arrays[i], Index=0});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(map.Count>0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ArrayCursor<T> lowest = map.Pop();Di2015NewLine 3056242Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static List<int> CreateList(int size) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use the same seed so that every list has the same elementsDi2015NewLine        Random random = new Random(589134554);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<int> list = new List<int>(size);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; 3061342Di2015UniqueSeparatorreadonly decimal PART1 = 30M;Di2015NewLinereadonly decimal PART2 = 50M;Di2015NewLinereadonly decimal PART3 = 100M;Di2015NewLinereadonly decimal INC1 = 1M;Di2015NewLinereadonly decimal INC2 = 2M;Di2015NewLinereadonly decimal INC5 = 5M;Di2015NewLinereadonly decimal INC10 = 10M;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void cuotaUno_ValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    decimal val = cuotaUno.Value;Di2015NewLine    decimal inc = cuotaUno.Increment;Di2015NewLine    decimal rem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (val < PART1 && inc != INC1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (inc == INC2 && val == (PART1 -INC2))Di2015NewLine            val += (inc - INC1);Di2015NewLine        inc = INC1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (val >= PART1 && val < PART2 && inc != INC2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (inc == INC5 && val == (PART2-INC5))Di2015NewLine            val += (inc - INC2);Di2015NewLine        inc = INC2;Di2015NewLine        rem = val % INC2;Di2015NewLine        if (rem != 0)Di2015NewLine            val -= rem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (val >= PART2 && val < PART3 && inc != INC5)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (inc == INC10 && val == (PART3-INC10))Di2015NewLine            val += (inc - INC5);Di2015NewLine        inc = INC5;Di2015NewLine        rem = val % INC5;Di2015NewLine        if (rem != 0)Di2015NewLine            val -= rem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (val >= PART3 && inc != INC10)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inc = INC10;Di2015NewLine        rem = val % INC10;Di2015NewLine        if (rem != 0)Di2015NewLine            val -= rem;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cuotaUno.Increment = inc;Di2015NewLine    cuotaUno.Value = val;            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3062558Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Write7BitEncodedInt32(Stream dest, int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write7BitEncodedUInt32(dest, (uint) value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void Write7BitEncodedUInt32(Stream dest, uint value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(value < 128) { dest.WriteByte((byte)value); return;}Di2015NewLine        while(value != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte b = (byte) (value & 0x7F);Di2015NewLine            value >>= 7; // since uint, we'll eventually run out of 1sDi2015NewLine            if (value != 0) b |= 0x80; // and there's moreDi2015NewLine            dest.WriteByte(b);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3067052Di2015UniqueSeparator        DateTime periodStart = new DateTime(2010, 10, 17);Di2015NewLine        DateTime periodEnd = new DateTime(2010, 11, 14);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const DayOfWeek FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK = DayOfWeek.Monday;Di2015NewLine        const DayOfWeek LAST_DAY_OF_WEEK = DayOfWeek.Sunday;Di2015NewLine        const int DAYS_IN_WEEK = 7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime firstDayOfWeekBeforeStartDate;Di2015NewLine        int daysBetweenStartDateAndPreviousFirstDayOfWeek = (int)periodStart.DayOfWeek - (int)FIRST_DAY_OF_WEEK;Di2015NewLine        if (daysBetweenStartDateAndPreviousFirstDayOfWeek >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            firstDayOfWeekBeforeStartDate = periodStart.AddDays(-daysBetweenStartDateAndPreviousFirstDayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            firstDayOfWeekBeforeStartDate = periodStart.AddDays(-(daysBetweenStartDateAndPreviousFirstDayOfWeek + DAYS_IN_WEEK));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime lastDayOfWeekAfterEndDate;Di2015NewLine        int daysBetweenEndDateAndFollowingLastDayOfWeek = (int)LAST_DAY_OF_WEEK - (int)periodEnd.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine        if (daysBetweenEndDateAndFollowingLastDayOfWeek >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lastDayOfWeekAfterEndDate = periodEnd.AddDays(daysBetweenEndDateAndFollowingLastDayOfWeek);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lastDayOfWeekAfterEndDate = periodEnd.AddDays(daysBetweenEndDateAndFollowingLastDayOfWeek + DAYS_IN_WEEK);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int calendarWeeks = 1 + (int)((lastDayOfWeekAfterEndDate - firstDayOfWeekBeforeStartDate).TotalDays / DAYS_IN_WEEK);Di2015NewLine

3067556Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Foo {Di2015NewLine    [Required]Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[AttributeProvider(typeof(Foo))]Di2015NewLinepublic class Bar {Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3067556Di2015UniqueSeparator    static bool IsRequiredProperty(Type t, string name) {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo pi = t.GetProperty(name);Di2015NewLine        if (pi == null) throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine        // First check if present on property as-isDi2015NewLine        if (pi.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(RequiredAttribute), false).Length > 0) return true;Di2015NewLine        // Then check if it is "inherited" from another typeDi2015NewLine        var prov = t.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(AttributeProviderAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine        if (prov.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine            t = (prov[0] as AttributeProviderAttribute).Type;Di2015NewLine            return IsRequiredProperty(t, name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3073830Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class MemoryEncoderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int CapacityDelta = 16;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private byte[] _buffer;Di2015NewLine    private int _currentByte;Di2015NewLine    private int _length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected MemoryEncoder()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Buffer = new byte[500];Di2015NewLine        Length = 0;Di2015NewLine        CurrentByte = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   The current byte index in the encoding stream.Di2015NewLine    ///   This should not need to be modified, under typical usage,Di2015NewLine    ///   but can be used to randomly access the encoding region.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public int CurrentByteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _currentByte;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value >= 0);Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value <= Length);Di2015NewLine            _currentByte = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    ///   Current number of bytes encoded in the buffer.Di2015NewLine    ///   This may be less than the size of the buffer (capacity).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public int LengthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _length; }Di2015NewLine        private setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value >= 0);Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value <= _buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value >= CurrentByte);Di2015NewLine            Contract.Ensures(_length <= _buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            _length = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// The raw buffer encapsulated by the encoder.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected internal Byte[] BufferDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _buffer; }Di2015NewLine        private setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value != null);Di2015NewLine            Contract.Requires(value.Length >= _length);Di2015NewLine            _buffer = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Reserve space in the encoder buffer for the specified number of new bytesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bytesRequired">The number of bytes required</param>Di2015NewLine    protected void ReserveSpace(int bytesRequired)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Requires(bytesRequired > 0);Di2015NewLine        Contract.Ensures((Length - CurrentByte) >= bytesRequired);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Check if these bytes would overflow the current buffer););Di2015NewLine        if ((CurrentByte + bytesRequired) > Buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Create a new buffer with at least enough space for the additional bytes requiredDi2015NewLine            var newBuffer = new Byte[Buffer.Length + Math.Max(bytesRequired, CapacityDelta)];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Copy the contents of the previous buffer and replace the original buffer referenceDi2015NewLine            Buffer.CopyTo(newBuffer, 0);Di2015NewLine            Buffer = newBuffer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Check if the total length of written bytes has increasedDi2015NewLine        if ((CurrentByte + bytesRequired) > Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Contract.Assume(CurrentByte + bytesRequired <= _buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            Length = CurrentByte + bytesRequired;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [ContractInvariantMethod]Di2015NewLine    private void GlobalRules()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(_buffer != null);Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(_length <= _buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(_currentByte >= 0);Di2015NewLine        Contract.Invariant(_currentByte <= _length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3074625Di2015UniqueSeparatorNM_DBLCLK
3074625Di2015UniqueSeparatorNativeMethods.NMHDR nmhdr = (NativeMethods.NMHDR)m.GetLParam(typeof(NativeMethods.NMHDR));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineswitch (nmhdr.code) {Di2015NewLinecase NM_DBLCLK:Di2015NewLine    // The default behavior of a .NET ListView with checkboxes is to toggle the checkbox onDi2015NewLine    // double-click. That's just silly, if you ask me :)Di2015NewLine    if (this.CheckBoxes) {Di2015NewLine        // How do we make ListView not do that silliness? We could just ignore the messageDi2015NewLine        // but the last part of the base code sets up state information, and without thatDi2015NewLine        // state, the ListView doesn't trigger MouseDoubleClick events. So we fake aDi2015NewLine        // right button double click event, which sets up the same state, but withoutDi2015NewLine        // toggling the checkbox.Di2015NewLine        nmhdr.code = NM_RDBLCLK;Di2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(nmhdr, m.LParam, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    break;Di2015NewLine

3074844Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SwitchView(Panel container, UserControl newView)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (container.Controls.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UserControl oldView = container.Controls[0] as UserControl;Di2015NewLine        container.Controls.Remove(0);Di2015NewLine        oldView.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (newView != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        newView.Dock = Dock.Fill;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Attach eventsDi2015NewLine        if (newView is ...)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           ...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        container.Controls.Add(newView);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3075127Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<string[]> GenerateFileNameStream(string[][] files)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int[] current_indices = new int[files.Length];Di2015NewLine    current_indices.Initialize();Di2015NewLine    List<string> file_names = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (current_indices[0] < files[0].Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        file_names.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var index_index = 0; index_index < current_indices.Length; index_index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            file_names.Add(files[index_index][current_indices[index_index]]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return file_names.ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // increment the indices, trickle down as neededDi2015NewLine        for (var check_index = 0; check_index < current_indices.Length; check_index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            current_indices[check_index]++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if the index hasn't rolled over, we're done hereDi2015NewLine            if (current_indices[check_index] < files[check_index].Length) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if the last location rolls over, then we are totally doneDi2015NewLine            if (check_index == current_indices.Length - 1) yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // reset this index, increment the next one in the next iterationDi2015NewLine            current_indices[check_index] = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3075127Di2015UniqueSeparatorfiles
3075127Di2015UniqueSeparatorlineNum
3075127Di2015UniqueSeparatorfiles
3075127Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void MakeItWork(string[][] files, int[] lineNum, string[] text, string[] previousFiles)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var iterator = 0;Di2015NewLine    var filenames = GenerateFileNameStream(files);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // work a copy of the text, assume the "previousFiles" are in this textDi2015NewLine    var text_copy = new string[text.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var filenameset in filenames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        iterator++;Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(text, text_copy, text.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var line_index = 0; line_index < lineNum.Length; line_index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var line_number = lineNum[line_index];Di2015NewLine            text[line_number] = text[line_number].Replace(previousFiles[line_index], filenameset[line_index / 2]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        buildNewFile(text_copy, Info.baseFolder + "networks\\\\" + Info.dsnFilename + iterator + ".dsn");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3087942Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void MoveElementUp(XElement element)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Walk backwards until we find an element - ignore text nodesDi2015NewLine    XNode previousNode = element.PreviousNode;Di2015NewLine    while (previousNode != null && !(previousNode is XElement))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        previousNode = previousNode.PreviousNode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (previousNode == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Nowhere to move element to!");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    element.Remove();Di2015NewLine    previousNode.AddBeforeSelf(element);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3090622Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static public List<int> temp = new List<int >();Di2015NewLine    static public List<Thread> worker = new List<Thread>();Di2015NewLine    static public List<List<int>> temporary = new List<List<int>>();Di2015NewLine    static public object sync = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        temp.add(20);Di2015NewLine        temp.add(10);Di2015NewLine        temp.add(5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add a corresponding number of listsDi2015NewLine        for( int i = 0; i < temp.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            temporary.Add(new List<int>);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // As Jon Skeet mentioned, z must be declared outside the for loopDi2015NewLine        int z = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (int k in temp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // As Jon Skeet mentioned, you need to capture the value of kDi2015NewLine            int copy = k;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread t = new Thread(() => { Sample(copy, z); });Di2015NewLine            t.Name = "Worker" + z.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // set the thread to background, so your thread is Di2015NewLine            // properly closed when your application closes.Di2015NewLine            t.IsBackground = true; Di2015NewLine            t.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Calling worker[z] will always going to be out of boundsDi2015NewLine            // because you didn't add anything to to the worker list,Di2015NewLine            // therefore you just need to add the thread to the workerDi2015NewLine            // list. Note that you're not doing anything with the workerDi2015NewLine            // list, so you might as well not have it at all.Di2015NewLine            worker.Add(t);Di2015NewLine            z++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Supply the order of your arrayDi2015NewLine    public static void Sample(int n, int order)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Technically in this particular case you don't need to Di2015NewLine            // synchronize, but it doesn't hurt to know how to do it.Di2015NewLine            lock(sync)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                temporary[order].Add(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3093875Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string[] GenerateCombinatins(string[] Array1, int[] Array2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(Array1 == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("Array1");Di2015NewLine    if(Array2 == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("Array2");Di2015NewLine    if(Array1.Length != Array2.Length)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Must be the same size as Array1.", "Array2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(Array1.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        return new string[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int outputSize = 1;Di2015NewLine    var current = new int[Array1.Length];Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < current.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(Array2[i] < 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Contains invalid values.", "Array2");Di2015NewLine        if(Array1[i] == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Contains null values.", "Array1");Di2015NewLine        outputSize *= Array2[i];Di2015NewLine        current[i] = 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = new string[outputSize];Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < outputSize; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for(int j = 0; j < current.Length; ++j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(Array1[j]);Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(current[j].ToString());Di2015NewLine            if(j != current.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(' ');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        result[i] = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine        int incrementIndex = current.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        while(incrementIndex >= 0 && current[incrementIndex] == Array2[incrementIndex])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                current[incrementIndex] = 1;Di2015NewLine                --incrementIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(incrementIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine            ++current[incrementIndex];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

   Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!File.Exists(filename)) {Di2015NewLine                using (Stream s = executingAssembly.GetManifestResourceStream(resourceName)) {Di2015NewLine                    using (var fs = new FileStream(filename, FileMode.Create)) {Di2015NewLine                        if (s == null) {Di2015NewLine                            throw new Exception("Failed to get resource stream for " + resourceName);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        var b = new byte[s.Length];Di2015NewLine                        s.Read(b, 0, b.Length);Di2015NewLine                        fs.Write(b, 0, b.Length);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            //Doing nothingDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3104301Di2015UniqueSeparatorcontext.Response.BinaryWrite()

3104301Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Byte[] GenerateImage()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  RNGCryptoServiceProvider rng = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine  Byte[] rand = new Byte[200];Di2015NewLine  rng.GetBytes(rand);Di2015NewLine  int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(_imageWidth, _imageHeight, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine  Bitmap cloneBmp = null;Di2015NewLine  Graphics g = null;Di2015NewLine  LinearGradientBrush backgroundBrush = null;Di2015NewLine  LinearGradientBrush textBrush = null;Di2015NewLine  SolidBrush[] circleBrush = new SolidBrush[3];Di2015NewLine  Font font = null;Di2015NewLine  GraphicsPath path = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    g = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLine    g.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine    Rectangle r = new Rectangle(0, 0, _imageWidth, _imageHeight);Di2015NewLine    backgroundBrush = new LinearGradientBrush(Di2015NewLine            new RectangleF(0, 0, _imageWidth, _imageHeight),Di2015NewLine            Color.FromArgb(rand[i++] / 2 + 128, rand[i++] / 2 + 128, 255),Di2015NewLine            Color.FromArgb(255, rand[i++] / 2 + 128, rand[i++] / 2 + 128),Di2015NewLine            rand[i++] * 360 / 256);Di2015NewLine    g.FillRectangle(backgroundBrush, r);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int br = 0; br < circleBrush.Length; br++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      circleBrush[br] = new SolidBrush(Color.FromArgb(128, rand[i++], rand[i++], rand[i++]));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int circle = 0; circle < 30; circle++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      int radius = rand[i++] % 10;Di2015NewLine      g.FillEllipse(circleBrush[circle % 2],Di2015NewLine          rand[i++] * _imageWidth / 256,Di2015NewLine          rand[i++] * _imageHeight / 256,Di2015NewLine          radius, radius);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    font = new Font("Tahoma", _imageHeight / 2, FontStyle.Regular);Di2015NewLine    StringFormat format = new StringFormat();Di2015NewLine    format.Alignment = StringAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLine    format.LineAlignment = StringAlignment.Center;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    path = new GraphicsPath();Di2015NewLine    path.AddString(_challengeKey, font.FontFamily, (int)font.Style, font.Size, r, format);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    textBrush = new LinearGradientBrush(Di2015NewLine            new RectangleF(0, 0, _imageWidth, _imageHeight),Di2015NewLine            Color.FromArgb(rand[i] % 128, rand[i] % 128, rand[i++] % 128),Di2015NewLine            Color.FromArgb(rand[i] % 128, rand[i] % 128, rand[i++] % 128),Di2015NewLine            rand[i++] * 360 / 256);Di2015NewLine    g.FillPath(textBrush, path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    cloneBmp = (Bitmap)bmp.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int distortionSeed = rand[i++];Di2015NewLine    double distortion = distortionSeed > 128 ? 5 + (distortionSeed - 128) % 5 : -5 - distortionSeed % 5;Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < _imageHeight; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for (int x = 0; x < _imageWidth; x++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Adds a simple waveDi2015NewLine        int newX = (int)(x + (distortion * Math.Sin(Math.PI * y / 96.0)));Di2015NewLine        int newY = (int)(y + (distortion * Math.Cos(Math.PI * x / 64.0)));Di2015NewLine        if (newX < 0 || newX >= _imageWidth)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          newX = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (newY < 0 || newY >= _imageHeight)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          newY = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bmp.SetPixel(x, y, cloneBmp.GetPixel(newX, newY));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    bmp.Save(stream, ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLine    return stream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  finallyDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (backgroundBrush != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      backgroundBrush.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (textBrush != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      textBrush.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    for (int br = 0; br < circleBrush.Length; br++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (circleBrush[br] != null)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        circleBrush[br].Dispose();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (font != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      font.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (path != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      path.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (g != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      g.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (bmp != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      bmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (cloneBmp != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      cloneBmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3104301Di2015UniqueSeparator public class ImageHandler : IHttpHandlerDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public bool IsReusableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        context.Response.ContentType = MimeTypeConstants.JPG;Di2015NewLine        context.Response.Clear();Di2015NewLine        context.Response.BinaryWrite(GenerateImage());Di2015NewLine        context.Response.End();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

3105899Di2015UniqueSeparator// Note: replacing CommitmentItem<T> in your example with ICollection<T>Di2015NewLine// and ITransaction with object.Di2015NewLinevar list = new List<ICollection<object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// If the behavior you wanted were possible, then this should be possible, since:Di2015NewLine// 1. List<string> implements ICollection<string>; andDi2015NewLine// 2. string inherits from object.Di2015NewLinelist.Add(new List<string>());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now, since list is typed as List<ICollection<object>>, our innerList variableDi2015NewLine// should be accessible as an ICollection<object>.Di2015NewLineICollection<object> innerList = list[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// But innerList is REALLY a List<string>, so although this SHOULD beDi2015NewLine// possible based on innerList's supposed type (ICollection<object>),Di2015NewLine// it is NOT legal due to innerList's actual type (List<string>).Di2015NewLine// This would constitute undefined behavior.Di2015NewLineinnerList.Add(new object());Di2015NewLine

3107567Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing HtmlAgilityPack;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Wayloop.Blog.Core.MarkupDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class HtmlSanitizerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly IDictionary<string, string[]> Whitelist;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static HtmlSanitizer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Whitelist = new Dictionary<string, string[]> {Di2015NewLine                { "a", new[] { "href" } },Di2015NewLine                { "strong", null },Di2015NewLine                { "em", null },Di2015NewLine                { "blockquote", null },Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Sanitize(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var htmlDocument = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            htmlDocument.LoadHtml(input);Di2015NewLine            SanitizeNode(htmlDocument.DocumentNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return htmlDocument.DocumentNode.WriteTo().Trim();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SanitizeChildren(HtmlNode parentNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = parentNode.ChildNodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--) {Di2015NewLine                SanitizeNode(parentNode.ChildNodes[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SanitizeNode(HtmlNode node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.NodeType == HtmlNodeType.Element) {Di2015NewLine                if (!Whitelist.ContainsKey(node.Name)) {Di2015NewLine                    node.ParentNode.RemoveChild(node);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (node.HasAttributes) {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = node.Attributes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--) {Di2015NewLine                        HtmlAttribute currentAttribute = node.Attributes[i];Di2015NewLine                        string[] allowedAttributes = Whitelist[node.Name];Di2015NewLine                        if (!allowedAttributes.Contains(currentAttribute.Name)) {Di2015NewLine                            node.Attributes.Remove(currentAttribute);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (node.HasChildNodes) {Di2015NewLine                SanitizeChildren(node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3107567Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HtmlSanitizerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly IDictionary<string, string[]> Whitelist;Di2015NewLine        private static List<string> DeletableNodesXpath = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static HtmlSanitizer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Whitelist = new Dictionary<string, string[]> {Di2015NewLine                { "a", new[] { "href" } },Di2015NewLine                { "strong", null },Di2015NewLine                { "em", null },Di2015NewLine                { "blockquote", null },Di2015NewLine                { "b", null},Di2015NewLine                { "p", null},Di2015NewLine                { "ul", null},Di2015NewLine                { "ol", null},Di2015NewLine                { "li", null},Di2015NewLine                { "div", new[] { "align" } },Di2015NewLine                { "strike", null},Di2015NewLine                { "u", null},                Di2015NewLine                { "sub", null},Di2015NewLine                { "sup", null},Di2015NewLine                { "table", null },Di2015NewLine                { "tr", null },Di2015NewLine                { "td", null },Di2015NewLine                { "th", null }Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Sanitize(string input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (input.Trim().Length < 1)Di2015NewLine                return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            var htmlDocument = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            htmlDocument.LoadHtml(input);            Di2015NewLine            SanitizeNode(htmlDocument.DocumentNode);Di2015NewLine            string xPath = HtmlSanitizer.CreateXPath();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return StripHtml(htmlDocument.DocumentNode.WriteTo().Trim(), xPath);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SanitizeChildren(HtmlNode parentNode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = parentNode.ChildNodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SanitizeNode(parentNode.ChildNodes[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void SanitizeNode(HtmlNode node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (node.NodeType == HtmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!Whitelist.ContainsKey(node.Name))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!DeletableNodesXpath.Contains(node.Name))Di2015NewLine                    {                       Di2015NewLine                        //DeletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name.Replace("?",""));Di2015NewLine                        node.Name = "removeableNode";Di2015NewLine                        DeletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    if (node.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        SanitizeChildren(node);Di2015NewLine                    }                  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (node.HasAttributes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = node.Attributes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        HtmlAttribute currentAttribute = node.Attributes[i];Di2015NewLine                        string[] allowedAttributes = Whitelist[node.Name];Di2015NewLine                        if (allowedAttributes != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (!allowedAttributes.Contains(currentAttribute.Name))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                node.Attributes.Remove(currentAttribute);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            node.Attributes.Remove(currentAttribute);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (node.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SanitizeChildren(node);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string StripHtml(string html, string xPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HtmlDocument htmlDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine            htmlDoc.LoadHtml(html);Di2015NewLine            if (xPath.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                HtmlNodeCollection invalidNodes = htmlDoc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes(@xPath);Di2015NewLine                foreach (HtmlNode node in invalidNodes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    node.ParentNode.RemoveChild(node, true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return htmlDoc.DocumentNode.WriteContentTo(); ;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string CreateXPath()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string _xPath = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < DeletableNodesXpath.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i != DeletableNodesXpath.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    _xPath += string.Format("//{0}|", DeletableNodesXpath[i].ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else _xPath += string.Format("//{0}", DeletableNodesXpath[i].ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return _xPath;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3111228Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic readonly Assembly[] References = new[] { typeof(Enumerable).Assembly, typeof(Component).Assembly };Di2015NewLinepublic Action CompileMacro(string source) {Di2015NewLine    var options = new CompilerParameters(References.Select(a => a.Location).ToArray()) {Di2015NewLine        GenerateInMemory = trueDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    string fullSource = @"public static class MacroHolder { public static void Execute() { \\r\\n" + source + "\\r\\n} }";Di2015NewLine    try {Di2015NewLine        var compiler = new CSharpCodeProvider(new Dictionary<string, string> { { "CompilerVersion", "v4.0" } });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = compiler.CompileAssemblyFromSource(options, fullSource);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (results.Errors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Join(Di2015NewLine                Environment.NewLine, Di2015NewLine                results.Errors.Cast<CompilerError>().Select(ce => ce.ErrorText)Di2015NewLine            ));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (Action)Delegate.CreateDelegate(Di2015NewLine            typeof(Action),Di2015NewLine            results.CompiledAssembly.GetType("MacroHolder").GetMethod("Execute")Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    } finally { options.TempFiles.Delete(); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3112330Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Wrapper for command objects, created for convenience to simplify ViewModel codeDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <author>Ben Schoepke</author>Di2015NewLine    public class CommandWrapperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<DelegateCommand<object>> _commands; // cache all commands as neededDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public CommandWrapper()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _commands = new List<DelegateCommand<object>>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns the ICommand object that contains the given delegatesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="executeMethod">Defines the method to be called when the command is invoked</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="canExecuteMethod">Defines the method that determines whether the command can execute in its current state.Di2015NewLine    /// Pass null if the command should always be executed.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The ICommand object that contains the given delegates</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <author>Ben Schoepke</author>Di2015NewLine    public ICommand GetCommand(Action<object> executeMethod, Predicate<object> canExecuteMethod)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Search for command in list of commandsDi2015NewLine        var command = (_commands.Where(Di2015NewLine                            cachedCommand => cachedCommand.ExecuteMethod.Equals(executeMethod) &&Di2015NewLine                                             cachedCommand.CanExecuteMethod.Equals(canExecuteMethod)))Di2015NewLine                                             .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If command is found, return itDi2015NewLine        if (command != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return command;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If command is not found, add it to the listDi2015NewLine        command = new DelegateCommand<object>(executeMethod, canExecuteMethod);Di2015NewLine        _commands.Add(command);Di2015NewLine        return command;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3115178Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap NewBitmap = (Bitmap)Image.Clone();Di2015NewLine
3115178Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap AdjustContrast(Bitmap Image, float Value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Value = (100.0f + Value) / 100.0f;Di2015NewLine    Value *= Value;Di2015NewLine    Bitmap NewBitmap = (Bitmap)Image.Clone();Di2015NewLine    BitmapData data = NewBitmap.LockBits(Di2015NewLine        new Rectangle(0, 0, NewBitmap.Width, NewBitmap.Height), Di2015NewLine        ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,Di2015NewLine        NewBitmap.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLine    int Height = NewBitmap.Height;Di2015NewLine    int Width = NewBitmap.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    unsafeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < Height; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte* row = (byte*)data.Scan0 + (y * data.Stride);Di2015NewLine            int columnOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < Width; ++x)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte B = row[columnOffset];Di2015NewLine                byte G = row[columnOffset + 1];Di2015NewLine                byte R = row[columnOffset + 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                float Red = R / 255.0f;Di2015NewLine                float Green = G / 255.0f;Di2015NewLine                float Blue = B / 255.0f;Di2015NewLine                Red = (((Red - 0.5f) * Value) + 0.5f) * 255.0f;Di2015NewLine                Green = (((Green - 0.5f) * Value) + 0.5f) * 255.0f;Di2015NewLine                Blue = (((Blue - 0.5f) * Value) + 0.5f) * 255.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int iR = (int)Red;Di2015NewLine                iR = iR > 255 ? 255 : iR;Di2015NewLine                iR = iR < 0 ? 0 : iR;Di2015NewLine                int iG = (int)Green;Di2015NewLine                iG = iG > 255 ? 255 : iG;Di2015NewLine                iG = iG < 0 ? 0 : iG;Di2015NewLine                int iB = (int)Blue;Di2015NewLine                iB = iB > 255 ? 255 : iB;Di2015NewLine                iB = iB < 0 ? 0 : iB;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                row[columnOffset] = (byte)iB;Di2015NewLine                row[columnOffset + 1] = (byte)iG;Di2015NewLine                row[columnOffset + 2] = (byte)iR;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                columnOffset += 4;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    NewBitmap.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return NewBitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3115514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Point3D> IntersectionOfLineSegmentWithAxisAlignedBox(Di2015NewLine    Point3D segmentBegin, Point3D segmentEnd, Point3D boxCenter, Size3D boxSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var beginToEnd = segmentEnd - segmentBegin;Di2015NewLine    var minToMax = new Vector3D(boxSize.X, boxSize.Y, boxSize.Z);Di2015NewLine    var min = boxCenter - minToMax / 2;Di2015NewLine    var max = boxCenter + minToMax / 2;Di2015NewLine    var beginToMin = min - segmentBegin;Di2015NewLine    var beginToMax = max - segmentBegin;Di2015NewLine    var tNear = double.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    var tFar = double.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine    var intersections = new List<Point3D>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (Axis axis in Enum.GetValues(typeof(Axis)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (beginToEnd.GetCoordinate(axis) == 0) // parallelDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (beginToMin.GetCoordinate(axis) > 0 || beginToMax.GetCoordinate(axis) < 0)Di2015NewLine                return intersections; // segment is not between planesDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var t1 = beginToMin.GetCoordinate(axis) / beginToEnd.GetCoordinate(axis);Di2015NewLine            var t2 = beginToMax.GetCoordinate(axis) / beginToEnd.GetCoordinate(axis);Di2015NewLine            var tMin = Math.Min(t1, t2);Di2015NewLine            var tMax = Math.Max(t1, t2);Di2015NewLine            if (tMin > tNear) tNear = tMin;Di2015NewLine            if (tMax < tFar) tFar = tMax;Di2015NewLine            if (tNear > tFar || tFar < 0) return intersections;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (tNear >= 0 && tNear <= 1) intersections.Add(segmentBegin + beginToEnd * tNear);Di2015NewLine    if (tFar >= 0 && tFar <= 1) intersections.Add(segmentBegin + beginToEnd * tFar);Di2015NewLine    return intersections;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3115514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum AxisDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    X,Di2015NewLine    Y,Di2015NewLine    ZDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3115514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double GetCoordinate(this Point3D point, Axis axis)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (axis)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case Axis.X:Di2015NewLine            return point.X;Di2015NewLine        case Axis.Y:Di2015NewLine            return point.Y;Di2015NewLine        case Axis.Z:Di2015NewLine            return point.Z;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static double GetCoordinate(this Vector3D vector, Axis axis)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (axis)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case Axis.X:Di2015NewLine            return vector.X;Di2015NewLine        case Axis.Y:Di2015NewLine            return vector.Y;Di2015NewLine        case Axis.Z:Di2015NewLine            return vector.Z;Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
