3116633Di2015UniqueSeparatorExtensionClassName.MethodName(target, ...)
3116633Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.CompilerServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ExtensionCollisionDetectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (args.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLineDi2015NewLine                ("Usage: ExtensionCollisionDetector <assembly file> [...]");Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (string file in args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Testing {0}...", file);Di2015NewLine            DetectCollisions(file);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DetectCollisions(string file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Assembly assembly = Assembly.LoadFrom(file);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var method in FindExtensionMethods(assembly))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DetectCollisions(method);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Yes, I know catching exception is generally bad. But hey,Di2015NewLine            // "something's" gone wrong. It's not going to do any harm toDi2015NewLine            // just go onto the next file.Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Error detecting collisions: {0}", e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<MethodBase> FindExtensionMethodsDi2015NewLine        (Assembly assembly)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return from type in assembly.GetTypes()Di2015NewLine               from method in type.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Static |Di2015NewLine                                              BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                                              BindingFlags.NonPublic)Di2015NewLine               where method.IsDefined(typeof(ExtensionAttribute), false)Di2015NewLine               select method;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DetectCollisions(MethodBase method)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("  Testing {0}.{1}", Di2015NewLine                          method.DeclaringType.Name, method.Name);Di2015NewLine        Type extendedType = method.GetParameters()[0].ParameterType;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var type in GetTypeAndAncestors(extendedType).Distinct())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var collision in DetectCollidingMethods(method, type))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("    Possible collision in {0}: {1}",Di2015NewLine                                  collision.DeclaringType.Name, collision);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<Type> GetTypeAndAncestors(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return type;Di2015NewLine        if (type.BaseType != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // I want yield foreach!Di2015NewLine            foreach (var t in GetTypeAndAncestors(type.BaseType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return t;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (var t in type.GetInterfaces()Di2015NewLine                              .SelectMany(iface => GetTypeAndAncestors(iface)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return t;Di2015NewLine        }        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<MethodBase>Di2015NewLine        DetectCollidingMethods(MethodBase extensionMethod, Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Very, very crude to start withDi2015NewLine        return type.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Instance |Di2015NewLine                               BindingFlags.Public |Di2015NewLine                               BindingFlags.NonPublic)Di2015NewLine                   .Where(candidate => candidate.Name == extensionMethod.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3117042Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar resultText = DigestAuthFixer.GrabResponse("/dir/index.html");Di2015NewLine
3117042Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DigestAuthFixerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static string _host = "http://localhost";Di2015NewLine    private static string _user = "Mufasa";Di2015NewLine    private static string _password = "Circle Of Life";Di2015NewLine    private static string _realm;Di2015NewLine    private static string _nonce;Di2015NewLine    private static string _qop;Di2015NewLine    private static string _cnonce;Di2015NewLine    private static DateTime _cnonceDate;Di2015NewLine    private static int _nc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string CalculateMd5Hash(Di2015NewLine        string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var inputBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(input);Di2015NewLine        var hash = MD5.Create().ComputeHash(inputBytes);Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var b in hash)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(b.ToString("x2"));Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GrabHeaderVar(Di2015NewLine        string varName,Di2015NewLine        string header)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var regHeader = new Regex(string.Format(@"{0}=""([^""]*)""", varName));Di2015NewLine        var matchHeader = regHeader.Match(header);Di2015NewLine        if (matchHeader.Success)Di2015NewLine            return matchHeader.Groups[1].Value;Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("Header {0} not found", varName));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digest_access_authenticationDi2015NewLine    private static string GetDigestHeader(Di2015NewLine        string dir)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _nc = _nc + 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ha1 = CalculateMd5Hash(string.Format("{0}:{1}:{2}", _user, _realm, _password));Di2015NewLine        var ha2 = CalculateMd5Hash(string.Format("{0}:{1}", "GET", dir));Di2015NewLine        var digestResponse =Di2015NewLine            CalculateMd5Hash(string.Format("{0}:{1}:{2:00000000}:{3}:{4}:{5}", ha1, _nonce, _nc, _cnonce, _qop, ha2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return string.Format("Digest username=\\"{0}\\", realm=\\"{1}\\", nonce=\\"{2}\\", uri=\\"{3}\\", " +Di2015NewLine            "algorithm=MD5, response=\\"{4}\\", qop={5}, nc={6:00000000}, cnonce=\\"{7}\\"",Di2015NewLine            _user, _realm, _nonce, dir, digestResponse, _qop, _nc, _cnonce);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GrabResponse(Di2015NewLine        string dir)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var url = _host + dir;Di2015NewLine        var uri = new Uri(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we've got a recent Auth header, re-use it!Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(_cnonce) &&Di2015NewLine            DateTime.Now.Subtract(_cnonceDate).TotalHours < 1.0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            request.Headers.Add("Authorization", GetDigestHeader(dir));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (WebException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Try to fix a 401 exception by adding a Authorization headerDi2015NewLine            if (ex.Response == null || ((HttpWebResponse)ex.Response).StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized)Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var wwwAuthenticateHeader = ex.Response.Headers["WWW-Authenticate"];Di2015NewLine            _realm = GrabHeaderVar("realm", wwwAuthenticateHeader);Di2015NewLine            _nonce = GrabHeaderVar("nonce", wwwAuthenticateHeader);Di2015NewLine            _qop = GrabHeaderVar("qop", wwwAuthenticateHeader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _nc = 0;Di2015NewLine            _cnonce = new Random().Next(123400, 9999999).ToString();Di2015NewLine            _cnonceDate = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var request2 = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine            request2.Headers.Add("Authorization", GetDigestHeader(dir));Di2015NewLine            response = (HttpWebResponse)request2.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var reader = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine        return reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3117318Di2015UniqueSeparatorNetworkMonitor
3117318Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NetworkMonitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ArrayList adapters;Di2015NewLine    public ArrayList monitoredAdapters;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NetworkMonitor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.adapters = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine        this.monitoredAdapters = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine        EnumerateNetworkAdapters();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void EnumerateNetworkAdapters()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PerformanceCounterCategory category = new PerformanceCounterCategory("Network Interface");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string name in category.GetInstanceNames())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (name == "MS TCP Loopback interface")Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            NetworkAdapter adapter = new NetworkAdapter(name);Di2015NewLine            adapter.dlCounter = new PerformanceCounter("Network Interface", "Bytes Received/sec", name);Di2015NewLine            adapter.ulCounter = new PerformanceCounter("Network Interface", "Bytes Sent/sec", name);Di2015NewLine            this.adapters.Add(adapter);Di2015NewLine            adapter.init();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NetworkAdapter[] AdaptersDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (NetworkAdapter[])this.adapters.ToArray(typeof(NetworkAdapter));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3117318Di2015UniqueSeparatorNetworkAdapter
3117318Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NetworkAdapterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Instances of this class are supposed to be created only in an NetworkMonitor.Di2015NewLine    internal NetworkAdapter(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.name = name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private long dlSpeed, ulSpeed;Di2015NewLine    private long dlValue, ulValue;Di2015NewLine    private long dlValueOld, ulValueOld;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal string name;Di2015NewLine    internal PerformanceCounter dlCounter, ulCounter;Di2015NewLine    internal bool Enabled;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal void init()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dlValueOld = this.dlCounter.NextSample().RawValue;Di2015NewLine        this.ulValueOld = this.ulCounter.NextSample().RawValue;Di2015NewLine        this.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Obtain new sample from performance counters, and refresh the values saved in dlSpeed, ulSpeed, etc.Di2015NewLine    // This method is supposed to be called only in NetworkMonitor, one time every second.Di2015NewLine    internal void refresh()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dlValue = this.dlCounter.NextSample().RawValue;Di2015NewLine        this.ulValue = this.ulCounter.NextSample().RawValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Calculates download and upload speed.Di2015NewLine        this.dlSpeed = this.dlValue - this.dlValueOld;Di2015NewLine        this.ulSpeed = this.ulValue - this.ulValueOld;Di2015NewLine        this.dlValueOld = this.dlValue;Di2015NewLine        this.ulValueOld = this.ulValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Overrides method to return the name of the adapter.Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string NameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Current download speed in bytes per second.Di2015NewLine    public long DownloadSpeed(int Interval)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.dlSpeed * 1000 / Interval;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Current upload speed in bytes per second.Di2015NewLine    public long UploadSpeed(int Interval)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.ulSpeed * 1000 / Interval;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3120119Di2015UniqueSeparator...Di2015NewLine    switch (comparisonType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case StringComparison.CurrentCulture:Di2015NewLine            return CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.CompareInfo.IsPrefix(this, value, CompareOptions.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase:Di2015NewLine            return CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.CompareInfo.IsPrefix(this, value, CompareOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case StringComparison.InvariantCulture:Di2015NewLine            return CultureInfo.InvariantCulture.CompareInfo.IsPrefix(this, value, CompareOptions.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase:Di2015NewLine            return CultureInfo.InvariantCulture.CompareInfo.IsPrefix(this, value, CompareOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case StringComparison.Ordinal:Di2015NewLine            return ((this.Length >= value.Length) && (nativeCompareOrdinalEx(this, 0, value, 0, value.Length) == 0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        case StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase:Di2015NewLine            return ((this.Length >= value.Length) && (TextInfo.CompareOrdinalIgnoreCaseEx(this, 0, value, 0, value.Length, value.Length) == 0));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException(Environment.GetResourceString("NotSupported_StringComparison"), "comparisonType");Di2015NewLine

3122078Di2015UniqueSeparatordef wrap(value, lower, upper):Di2015NewLine    distance = upper - lowerDi2015NewLine    return value - ((value-lower)//distance)*distanceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef shortestangle(a,b):Di2015NewLine    angle = wrap(b-a, 0, 360)Di2015NewLine    if angle>=180: angle -= 360Di2015NewLine    return angleDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef interpolate(a,b,amount):Di2015NewLine    return (a+shortestangle(a,b)*amount)%360Di2015NewLine

3122251Di2015UniqueSeparatorelementDi2015NewLine------------------Di2015NewLineelement_idDi2015NewLine~....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineelement_nameDi2015NewLine------------------Di2015NewLineelement_name_idDi2015NewLinefk_element_idDi2015NewLinenameDi2015NewLinelanguage_idDi2015NewLineis_default_name  Default ( 0 )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTrigger:Di2015NewLineif ( ( select count ( 1 ) from element_name where is_default_name = 1 ) > 1 )Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    raisError ( 'only 1 element_name may be marked is_default_name = true.', 16, 1 );Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

3122532Di2015UniqueSeparatorPoint
3122532Di2015UniqueSeparatorx
3122532Di2015UniqueSeparatory
3122532Di2015UniqueSeparatordef GetClosestPoint(A, B, P)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  a_to_p = [P.x - A.x, P.y - A.y]     # Storing vector A->PDi2015NewLine  a_to_b = [B.x - A.x, B.y - A.y]     # Storing vector A->BDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  atb2 = a_to_b[0]**2 + a_to_b[1]**2  # **2 means "squared"Di2015NewLine                                      #   Basically finding the squared magnitudeDi2015NewLine                                      #   of a_to_bDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  atp_dot_atb = a_to_p[0]*a_to_b[0] + a_to_p[1]*a_to_b[1]Di2015NewLine                                      # The dot product of a_to_p and a_to_bDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  t = atp_dot_atb / atb2              # The normalized "distance" from a toDi2015NewLine                                      #   your closest pointDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return Point.new( :x => A.x + a_to_b[0]*t,Di2015NewLine                    :y => A.y + a_to_b[1]*t )Di2015NewLine                                      # Add the distance to A, movingDi2015NewLine                                      #   towards BDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLine
3122532Di2015UniqueSeparatordef getClosestPointFromLine(A, B, P)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  a_to_b = [B.x - A.x, B.y - B.y]   # Finding the vector from A to BDi2015NewLine                                        This step can be combined with the nextDi2015NewLine  perpendicular = [ -a_to_b[1], a_to_b[0] ]Di2015NewLine                                    # The vector perpendicular to a_to_b;Di2015NewLine                                        This step can also be combined with the nextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Q = Point.new(:x => P.x + perpendicular[0], :y => P.y + perpendicular[1])Di2015NewLine                                    # Finding Q, the point "in the right direction"Di2015NewLine                                        If you want a mess, you can also combine thisDi2015NewLine                                        with the next step.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return Point.new (:x => ((A.x*B.y - A.y*B.x)*(P.x - Q.x) - (A.x-B.x)*(P.x*Q.y - P.y*Q.x)) / ((A.x - B.x)*(P.y-Q.y) - (A.y - B.y)*(P.y-Q.y)),Di2015NewLine                    :y => ((A.x*B.y - A.y*B.x)*(P.y - Q.y) - (A.y-B.y)*(P.x*Q.y - P.y*Q.x)) / ((A.x - B.x)*(P.y-Q.y) - (A.y - B.y)*(P.y-Q.y)) )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLine
3122569Di2015UniqueSeparator(tooBigIndex < n) &&Di2015NewLine
3122569Di2015UniqueSeparator(tooBigIndex < first + n) &&Di2015NewLine
3122569Di2015UniqueSeparator   t= data[0];Di2015NewLine   data[0]= data[tooSmallIndex];Di2015NewLine   data[tooSmallIndex]=t;Di2015NewLine

3129366Di2015UniqueSeparatorDecodeBinaryBase64
3129366Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring.Format("{0:X2}", b)
3129366Di2015UniqueSeparatorDecodeBinaryBase64
3129366Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string DecodeBinaryBase64(string stringToDecode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var b in Convert.FromBase64String(stringToDecode))Di2015NewLine        builder.Append(string.Format("{0:X2}", b));Di2015NewLine    return "0x" + builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string EncodeBinaryBase64(string stringToEncode)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var binary = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 2; i < stringToEncode.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string s = new string(new [] {stringToEncode[i], stringToEncode[i+1]});Di2015NewLine        binary.Add(byte.Parse(s, NumberStyles.HexNumber));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToBase64String(binary.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3129908Di2015UniqueSeparatorSub GenerateTimeLine()Di2015NewLine    Dim ap As PresentationDi2015NewLine    Set ap = ActivePresentationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Set to first slideDi2015NewLine    Dim sl As SlideDi2015NewLine    Set sl = ap.Slides(1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Use Slide Master for Presentation dimensionsDi2015NewLine    Dim sm As MasterDi2015NewLine    Set sm = ap.SlideMasterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Create a timeline body of 75% the width of the slideDi2015NewLine    Dim w As IntegerDi2015NewLine    w = sm.Width * 0.75Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Create a timeline body of 5% the height of the slideDi2015NewLine    Dim h As IntegerDi2015NewLine    h = sm.Height * 0.1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Center horizontal position of timeline bodyDi2015NewLine    Dim posX As IntegerDi2015NewLine    posX = Abs(w - sm.Width) / 2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Center vertical position of timeline bodyDi2015NewLine    Dim posY As IntegerDi2015NewLine    posY = Abs(h - sm.Height) / 2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Add main shapeDi2015NewLine    Dim timeLineBodyShape As ShapeDi2015NewLine    Set timeLineBodyShape = sl.Shapes.AddShape(msoShapeRectangle, posX, posY, w, h)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Set up initial variablesDi2015NewLine    Dim timeLineBodyName As StringDi2015NewLine    timeLineBodyName = "Showjumping"Di2015NewLine    Dim yearMin As IntegerDi2015NewLine    Dim yearMax As IntegerDi2015NewLine    yearMin = 1864Di2015NewLine    yearMax = 2006Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Add to variables timelineDi2015NewLine    With timeLineBodyShape.TextFrameDi2015NewLine        With .Ruler.TabStopsDi2015NewLine            .Add ppTabStopLeft, 0Di2015NewLine            .Add ppTabStopCenter, timeLineBodyShape.Width / 2Di2015NewLine            .Add ppTabStopRight, timeLineBodyShape.WidthDi2015NewLine        End WithDi2015NewLine        With .TextRangeDi2015NewLine            .InsertAfter CStr(yearMin) + Chr(9) + timeLineBodyName + Chr(9) + CStr(yearMax)Di2015NewLine            .Font.Bold = msoTrueDi2015NewLine        End WithDi2015NewLine    End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Create time line nodesDi2015NewLine    Dim timeLineNodeYear As IntegerDi2015NewLine    Dim timeLineNodeText As StringDi2015NewLine    Dim timeLineNodeTop As BooleanDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeYear = 1864Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeText = "First Competition. Horse Show of the Royal Dublin Society"Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeTop = TrueDi2015NewLine    AddtimeLineNode timeLineBodyShape, timeLineNodeYear, timeLineNodeText, timeLineNodeTop, _Di2015NewLine        sl, yearMin, yearMax, smDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeYear = 1912Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeText = "Stockholm Olympic Games. Team competition for first time in jumping"Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeTop = FalseDi2015NewLine    AddtimeLineNode timeLineBodyShape, timeLineNodeYear, timeLineNodeText, timeLineNodeTop, _Di2015NewLine        sl, yearMin, yearMax, smDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeYear = 1925Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeText = "Aachen. For the first time Aachen Grand Prix"Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeTop = TrueDi2015NewLine    AddtimeLineNode timeLineBodyShape, timeLineNodeYear, timeLineNodeText, timeLineNodeTop, _Di2015NewLine        sl, yearMin, yearMax, smDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeYear = 1953Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeText = "Paris. For first time World Championship for men"Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeTop = FalseDi2015NewLine    AddtimeLineNode timeLineBodyShape, timeLineNodeYear, timeLineNodeText, timeLineNodeTop, _Di2015NewLine        sl, yearMin, yearMax, smDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeYear = 1979Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeText = "The first Volvo World Cup Final"Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeTop = TrueDi2015NewLine    AddtimeLineNode timeLineBodyShape, timeLineNodeYear, timeLineNodeText, timeLineNodeTop, _Di2015NewLine        sl, yearMin, yearMax, smDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeYear = 1990Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeText = "Stockholm. The first World Equestrian Games"Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeTop = FalseDi2015NewLine    AddtimeLineNode timeLineBodyShape, timeLineNodeYear, timeLineNodeText, timeLineNodeTop, _Di2015NewLine        sl, yearMin, yearMax, smDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeYear = 2006Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeText = "Aachen. Biggest World Equestrian Games until now"Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeTop = TrueDi2015NewLine    AddtimeLineNode timeLineBodyShape, timeLineNodeYear, timeLineNodeText, timeLineNodeTop, _Di2015NewLine        sl, yearMin, yearMax, smDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLineSub AddtimeLineNode(tlShape As Shape, tlYear As Integer, tlText As String, tlTop As Boolean, _Di2015NewLine        sl As Slide, yearMin As Integer, yearMax As Integer, sm As Master)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    'Positioning calculationsDi2015NewLine    Dim shapeDifference As SingleDi2015NewLine    shapeDifference = tlShape.Width - tlShape.LeftDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim yearDifferenceDi2015NewLine    yearDifference = yearMax - yearMinDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim timeLineNodeShape As ShapeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeShapeWidth = 100Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeShapeHeight = 100Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeShapePosLeft = (tlShape.Left + (((tlYear - yearMin) / yearDifference) * shapeDifference))Di2015NewLine    timeLineNodeShapePosTop = 30Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If tlTop ThenDi2015NewLine        Set timeLineNodeShape = sl.Shapes.AddShape(msoShapeRectangularCallout, timeLineNodeShapePosLeft, _Di2015NewLine            timeLineNodeShapePosTop, timeLineNodeShapeWidth, timeLineNodeShapeHeight)Di2015NewLine        timeLineNodeShapeMid = timeLineNodeShape.Top + timeLineNodeShape.Height / 2Di2015NewLine        timeLineBodyShapeHeight = tlShape.HeightDi2015NewLine        Distance = tlShape.Top - timeLineNodeShapeMidDi2015NewLine        handleYplacement = Distance / timeLineNodeShape.HeightDi2015NewLine        timeLineNodeShape.Adjustments(2) = handleYplacementDi2015NewLine    ElseDi2015NewLine        timeLineNodeShapePosBottom = sm.Height - timeLineNodeShapeHeight - timeLineNodeShapePosTopDi2015NewLine        Set timeLineNodeShape = sl.Shapes.AddShape(msoShapeRectangularCallout, timeLineNodeShapePosLeft, _Di2015NewLine            timeLineNodeShapePosBottom, timeLineNodeShapeWidth, timeLineNodeShapeHeight)Di2015NewLine        timeLineNodeShapeMid = timeLineNodeShape.Top + timeLineNodeShape.Height / 2Di2015NewLine        timeLineBodyShapeHeight = tlShape.HeightDi2015NewLine        Distance = (tlShape.Top + tlShape.Height) - timeLineNodeShapeMidDi2015NewLine        handleYplacement = Distance / timeLineNodeShape.HeightDi2015NewLine        timeLineNodeShape.Adjustments(2) = handleYplacementDi2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeShape.TextFrame.TextRange = CStr(tlYear) & ", " & tlTextDi2015NewLine    timeLineNodeShape.TextFrame2.AutoSize = msoAutoSizeTextToFitShapeDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

3136437Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction Find-Computer( [string]$assetTag ) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $searcher = New-Object System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher;Di2015NewLine    $searcher.SearchRoot = New-Object System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry;Di2015NewLine    $searcher.SearchScope = 'Subtree';Di2015NewLine    $searcher.PageSize = 1000;Di2015NewLine    $searcher.Filter = '(objectCategory=computer)';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $results = $searcher.FindAll();Di2015NewLine    $computers = @();Di2015NewLine    foreach($result in $results) {Di2015NewLine        $computers += $result.GetDirectoryEntry();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    $results.Dispose(); #Explicitly needed to free resources.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $computers |? { $_.Name -match $assetTag }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

            as IEnumerator;Di2015NewLine            if (subRoutine != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stackFrame.Push(currentRoutine);Di2015NewLine stackFrame.Pop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          OnFiberTerminated(Di2015NewLine              new FiberTerminatedEventArgs(Di2015NewLine                  currentRoutine.CurrentDi2015NewLine              )Di2015NewLine          );Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string OriginalProperty Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        get; Di2015NewLine        private set; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object TypeId Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            return _typeId; Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string FormatErrorMessage(string name) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        return String.Format(CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture, ErrorMessageString, Di2015NewLine            OriginalProperty, ConfirmProperty); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool IsValid(object value) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        PropertyDescriptorCollection properties = TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(value); Di2015NewLine        // ignore case for the followingDi2015NewLine        object originalValue = properties.Find(OriginalProperty, true).GetValue(value); Di2015NewLine        object confirmValue = properties.Find(ConfirmProperty, true).GetValue(value); Di2015NewLine        return Object.Equals(originalValue, confirmValue); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

3140115Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void IsVisiblePoint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // Set clip region.Di2015NewLine   Region clipRegion = new Region(new Rectangle(50, 50, 100, 100));Di2015NewLine   e.Graphics.SetClip(clipRegion, CombineMode.Replace);Di2015NewLine   // Set up coordinates of points.Di2015NewLine   int x1 = 100;Di2015NewLine   int y1 = 100;Di2015NewLine   int x2 = 200;Di2015NewLine   int y2 = 200;Di2015NewLine   Point point1 = new Point(x1, y1);Di2015NewLine   Point point2 = new Point(x2, y2);Di2015NewLine   // If point is visible, fill ellipse that represents it.Di2015NewLine   if (e.Graphics.IsVisible(point1))Di2015NewLine   e.Graphics.FillEllipse(new SolidBrush(Color.Red), x1, y1, 10, 10);Di2015NewLine   if (e.Graphics.IsVisible(point2))Di2015NewLine   e.Graphics.FillEllipse(new SolidBrush(Color.Blue), x2, y2, 10, 10);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3141226Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SampleFileType : FileTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public SampleFileType() : base ("Sample file type", FileTypeFlags.SupportsSaving |Di2015NewLine                                FileTypeFlags.SupportsLoading,Di2015NewLine                                new string[] { ".sample" })Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnSave(Document input, System.IO.Stream output, SaveConfigToken token, Surface scratchSurface, ProgressEventHandler callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Here you get the image from Paint.NET and you'll have to convert itDi2015NewLine        //and write the resulting bytes to the output stream (this will save it to the specified file)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (RenderArgs ra = new RenderArgs(new Surface(input.Size)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //You must call this to prepare the bitmapDi2015NewLine                    input.Render(ra);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Now you can access the bitmap and perform some logic on itDi2015NewLine            //In this case I'm converting the bitmap to something else (byte[])Di2015NewLine            var sampleData = ConvertBitmapToSampleFormat(ra.Bitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            output.Write(sampleData, 0, sampleData.Length);                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Document OnLoad(System.IO.Stream input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Input is the binary data from the fileDi2015NewLine        //What you need to do here is convert that date to a valid instance of System.Drawing.BitmapDi2015NewLine        //In the end you need to return it by Document.FromImage(bitmap)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //The ConvertFromFileToBitmap, just like the ConvertBitmapSampleFormat,Di2015NewLine        //is simply a function which takes the binary data and converts it to a valid instance of System.Drawing.BitmapDi2015NewLine        //You will have to define a function like this which does whatever you want to the dataDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using(var bitmap = ConvertFromFileToBitmap(input))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Document.FromImage(bitmap);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3141304Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> StringToList(string stringToSplit, char splitDelimiter) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    List<int> list = new IntList(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringToSplit)) Di2015NewLine        return list; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this if is not necessary. As others have said, Split will return a string[1] with the original string if no delimiter is foundDi2015NewLine    if (stringToSplit.Contains(splitDelimiter.ToString())) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        string[] values = stringToSplit.Split(splitDelimiter); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //why check this? if there are no values, the foreach will do nothing and fall through to a return anyway.Di2015NewLine        if (values.Length <= 1) Di2015NewLine            return list; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string s in values) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            int i; Di2015NewLine            if (Int32.TryParse(s, out i)) Di2015NewLine                list.Add(i); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    //again, this is rendered redundant due to previous commentsDi2015NewLine    else if (stringToSplit.Length > 0) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        int i; Di2015NewLine        if(Int32.TryParse(stringToSplit, out i)) Di2015NewLine            list.Add(i); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return list; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3141304Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> StringToList(string stringToSplit, char splitDelimiter) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    List<int> list = new IntList(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(stringToSplit)) Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(var s in stringToSplit.Split(splitDelimiter))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i;Di2015NewLine        if(int.TryParse(s, out i))Di2015NewLine            list.Add(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3141566Di2015UniqueSeparator   public static XmlSerializer GetSerializerFor(Type typeOfT)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_serializers.ContainsKey(typeOfT))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(string.Format("XmlSerializerFactory.GetSerializerFor(typeof({0}));", typeOfT));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var types = new List<Type> { typeOfT, typeOfT.BaseType };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var property in typeOfT.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                types.Add(property.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            types.RemoveAll(t => t.ToString().StartsWith("System."));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var xmlAttributeOverrides = new XmlAttributeOverrides();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var type in types)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (xmlAttributeOverrides[type] != null)         },Di2015NewLine                                            Xmlns = falseDi2015NewLine                                        };Di2015NewLine                xmlAttributeOverrides.Add(type, xmlAttributes);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var newSerializer = new XmlSerializer(typeOfT, xmlAttributeOverrides);Di2015NewLine            //var newSerializer = new string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _serializers.Add(typeOfT, newSerializer);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _serializers[typeOfT];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetSerializationTypeName(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var xmlTypeAttribute = TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes(type)Di2015NewLine            .OfType<XmlTypeAttribute>().FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var typeName = xmlTypeAttribute.TypeName;Di2015NewLine        return string.IsNullOrEmpty(typeName) ? type.Name : typeName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3141731Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble
3141731Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate double CalculateStdDev(IEnumerable<double> values)Di2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine  double ret = 0;Di2015NewLine  if (values.Count() > 0) Di2015NewLine  {      Di2015NewLine     //Compute the Average      Di2015NewLine     double avg = values.Average();Di2015NewLine     //Perform the Sum of (value-avg)_2_2      Di2015NewLine     double sum = values.Sum(d => Math.Pow(d - avg, 2));Di2015NewLine     //Put it all together      Di2015NewLine     ret = Math.Sqrt((sum) / (values.Count()-1));   Di2015NewLine  }   Di2015NewLine  return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3142157Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static string GetMAC(string ip)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPAddress dst = IPAddress.Parse(ip); // the destination IP address Note:Can Someone give the code to get the IP address of the serverDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] macAddr = new byte[6];Di2015NewLine        uint macAddrLen = (uint)macAddr.Length;Di2015NewLine        if (SendARP((int)dst.Address, 0, macAddr, ref macAddrLen) != 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("SendARP failed.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] str = new string[(int)macAddrLen];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < macAddrLen; i++)Di2015NewLine            str[i] = macAddr[i].ToString("x2");Di2015NewLine        return string.Join(":", str);Di2015NewLine        //Console.WriteLine(string.Join(":", str));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3142172Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> GetNames(IEnumerable<string> originalList, string fromName, string toName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (string name in originalList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (name.CompareTo(fromName) >= 0 && name.CompareTo(toName) <= 0)Di2015NewLine            yield return name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnPreRender( e );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( Messages.Count > 0 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            StringBuilder             script.AppendFormat( "for(i=0;i<messages.length;i++) alert(messages[i]);{0}", Environment.NewLine );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine 3154600Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    int count = 100000;  Di2015NewLine    WithRegex(count);  Di2015NewLine    WithSplit(count);  Di2015NewLine    WithIndexOf(count);Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid WithRegex(int count)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    Regex _commaRegex = new Regex(@",", RegexOptions.Compiled);  Di2015NewLine    string[] names = Enumerable.Range(1,count)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => "first,last,middle" + i).ToArray();  Di2015NewLine    List<string> newNames = new List<string>(count);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch(); Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Start();  Di2015NewLine    foreach (string name in names)  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        string[] split = _commaRegex.Split(name);  Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();  Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(split[0]).Append(split[2]).Append(split[1]);  Di2015NewLine        newNames.Add(sb.ToString());  Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Stop(); Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Elapsed.Dump("Regex Time");  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid WithSplit(int count)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    string[] names = Enumerable.Range(1,count)Di2015NewLine         .Select(i => "first,last,middle" + i).ToArray();  Di2015NewLine    List<string> newNames = new List<string>(count);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch(); Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Start();  Di2015NewLine    foreach (string name in names)  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        string[] split = name.Split(',');  Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();  Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(split[0]).Append(split[2]).Append(split[1]);  Di2015NewLine        newNames.Add(sb.ToString());  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Stop(); Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Elapsed.Dump("Split Time");  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid WithIndexOf(int count)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    string[] names = Enumerable.Range(1,count)Di2015NewLine        .Select(i => "first,last,middle" + i).ToArray();  Di2015NewLine    List<string> newNames = new List<string>(count);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Stopwatch stopWatch = new Stopwatch(); Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Start();  Di2015NewLine    foreach (string name in names)  Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /* This approach only works for 2 commas */Di2015NewLine        int firstComma = name.IndexOf(',');Di2015NewLine        int lastComma = name.LastIndexOf(',');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string first = name.Substring(0, firstComma);Di2015NewLine        string last = name.Substring(firstComma + 1, lastComma-(firstComma+1));Di2015NewLine        string middle = name.Substring(lastComma + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();  Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(first).Append(middle).Append(last);  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        newNames.Add(sb.ToString());  Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Stop(); Di2015NewLine    stopWatch.Elapsed.Dump("IndexOf Time");  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

BorderDetector.precision)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int y = precision; y < this.b.Height; y += BorderDetector.precision)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine region2Color) region2Points.Add(new Point(x, y));Di2015NewLine                    else if (c == borderColor) borderPoints.Add(new Point(x, y));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Returns a distance of two points (inaccurate but very fast).</summary>Di2015NewLine        private int GetDistance(Point p1, Point p2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Math.Abs(p1.X - p2.X) + Math.Abs(p1.Y - p2.Y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Finds the closests 2 points among the points in the 2 sets.</summary>Di2015NewLine        private int FindClosestPoints(List<Point> r1Points, List<Point> r2Points, out Point foundR1, out Point foundR2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int minDistance = Int32.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine            int distance = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foundR1 = Point.Empty;Di2015NewLine            foundR2 = Point.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (Point r1 in r1Points)Di2015NewLine                foreach (Point r2 in r2Points)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    distance = this.GetDistance(r1, r2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (distance < minDistance)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foundR1 = r1;Di2015NewLine                        foundR2 = r2;Di2015NewLine                        minDistance = distance;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return minDistance;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool FindBorder()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Point r1;Di2015NewLine            Point r2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            watch.Start();Di2015NewLine            this.ScanBitmap();Di2015NewLine            watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine            this.Miliseconds1 = watch.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            watch.Start();Di2015NewLine            int distance = this.FindClosestPoints(this.region1Points, this.region2Points, out r1, out r2);Di2015NewLine            watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine            this.Miliseconds2 = watch.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.b.SetPixel(r1.X, r1.Y, Color.Green);Di2015NewLine            this.b.SetPixel(r2.X, r2.Y, Color.Red);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (distance <= BorderDetector.distanceTreshold);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3164689Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class SourceDataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int TypeId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Date { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal class ResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int TypeId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime StartDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime EndDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var a = new List<SourceData> {Di2015NewLine            new SourceData {TypeId = 1, Date = new DateTime(2010, 02, 01)},Di2015NewLine            new SourceData {TypeId = 1, Date = new DateTime(2010, 02, 02)},Di2015NewLine            new SourceData {TypeId = 1, Date = new DateTime(2010, 02, 03)}, Di2015NewLine            new SourceData {TypeId = 2, Date = new DateTime(2010, 02, 03)}, Di2015NewLine            new SourceData {TypeId = 2, Date = new DateTime(2010, 02, 04)}, Di2015NewLine            new SourceData {TypeId = 2, Date = new DateTime(2010, 02, 06)} Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var results = new List<Result>();Di2015NewLine        int currentTypeId = 1;Di2015NewLine        var rangeEndDate = new DateTime();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DateTime rangeStartDate = a[0].Date;Di2015NewLine        DateTime currentDate = a[0].Date;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < a.Count() ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (a[i].TypeId != currentTypeId)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results.Add(new Result() { TypeId = currentTypeId, StartDate = rangeStartDate, EndDate = rangeEndDate });Di2015NewLine                currentTypeId += 1;                    Di2015NewLine                rangeStartDate = a[i].Date;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TimeSpan tSpan = a[i].Date - currentDate;Di2015NewLine            int differenceInDays = tSpan.Days;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(differenceInDays > 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results.Add(new Result { TypeId = currentTypeId, StartDate = rangeStartDate, EndDate = a[i-1].Date });Di2015NewLine                rangeStartDate = a[i].Date;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            rangeEndDate = a[i].Date;Di2015NewLine            currentDate = a[i].Date;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        results.Add(new Result { TypeId = currentTypeId, StartDate = rangeStartDate, EndDate = rangeEndDate });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Output\\n");Di2015NewLine        foreach (var r in results)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine( string.Format( "{0} - {1} - {2}",r.TypeId,r.StartDate.ToShortDateString(),r.EndDate.ToShortDateString()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3166213Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<int, string> GetListItems(Type enumType)  Di2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine    if (!enumType.IsEnum)  Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException("GetListItems does not support non-enum types");  Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, string> list = new Dictionary<int, string>();  Di2015NewLine    foreach(FieldInfo field in enumType.GetFields(BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.GetField | BindingFlags.Public))  Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        int value;  Di2015NewLine        string display;  Di2015NewLine        value = (int)field.GetValue(null);  Di2015NewLine        display = Enum.GetName(enumType, value);  Di2015NewLine        foreach(Attribute currAttr in field.GetCustomAttributes(true))  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine            EnumValueDataAttribute valueAttribute = currAttr as EnumValueDataAttribute;  Di2015NewLine            if (valueAttribute != null)  Di2015NewLine                display = valueAttribute.Name;  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine        list.Add(value, display);  Di2015NewLine    }  Di2015NewLine    return list;  Di2015NewLine}  Di2015NewLine

3171925Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int ReadLastKey()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int lastKey = -1;Di2015NewLine  for(;;)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ConsoleKeyInfo ki = Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    if (ki.Key != ConsoleKey.Enter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      lastKey = (int)ki.KeyChar;          Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return lastKey;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }       Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3171925Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int ReadLastKey()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int lastKey = -1;Di2015NewLine  ConsoleKeyInfo ki;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Read initial key pressDi2015NewLine  ki = Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // If it is enter then return -1Di2015NewLine  if (ki.Key == ConsoleKey.Enter) return lastKey;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  lastKey = (int)ki.KeyChar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Wait for the user to press enter before returning the last key presss,Di2015NewLine  // and do not display key the errant key presses.Di2015NewLine  doDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ki = Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine  } while (ki.Key != ConsoleKey.Enter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return lastKey;      Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3172709Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring input = "QSMDRYCELL   11.00   11.10   11.00   11.00    -.90      11     11000     1.212";Di2015NewLinestring pattern = @"^(\\S+)\\s+(\\s+[\\d.-]+){8}$";Di2015NewLineMatch match = Regex.Match(input, pattern, RegexOptions.MultiLine);Di2015NewLineif (match.Success) {Di2015NewLine   Console.WriteLine("Matched text: {0}", match.Value);Di2015NewLine   for (int ctr = 1; ctr < match.Groups.Count; ctr++) {Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("   Group {0}:  {1}", ctr, match.Groups[ctr].Value);Di2015NewLine      int captureCtr = 0;Di2015NewLine      foreach (Capture capture in match.Groups[ctr].Captures) {Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine("      Capture {0}: {1}", Di2015NewLine                           captureCtr, capture.Value);Di2015NewLine         captureCtr++; Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3172740Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Rectangle dragBoxFromMouseDown;Di2015NewLineprivate int rowIndexFromMouseDown;Di2015NewLineprivate int rowIndexOfItemUnderMouseToDrop;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if ((e.Button & MouseButtons.Left) == MouseButtons.Left)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the mouse moves outside the rectangle, start the drag.Di2015NewLine        if (dragBoxFromMouseDown != Rectangle.Empty &&Di2015NewLine            !dragBoxFromMouseDown.Contains(e.X, e.Y))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Proceed with the drag and drop, passing in the list item.                    Di2015NewLine            DragDropEffects dropEffect = dataGridView1.DoDragDrop(dataGridView1.Rows[rowIndexFromMouseDown], DragDropEffects.Move);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Get the index of the item the mouse is below.Di2015NewLine    rowIndexFromMouseDown = dataGridView1.HitTest(e.X, e.Y).RowIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (rowIndexFromMouseDown != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Remember the point where the mouse down occurred. Di2015NewLine        // The DragSize indicates the size that the mouse can move Di2015NewLine        // before a drag event should be started.                Di2015NewLine        Size dragSize = SystemInformation.DragSize;Di2015NewLine        // Create a rectangle using the DragSize, with the mouse position beingDi2015NewLine        // at the center of the rectangle.Di2015NewLine        dragBoxFromMouseDown = new Rectangle(new Point(e.X - (dragSize.Width / 2), e.Y - (dragSize.Height / 2)), dragSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Reset the rectangle if the mouse is not over an item in the ListBox.Di2015NewLine        dragBoxFromMouseDown = Rectangle.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_DragOver(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    e.Effect = DragDropEffects.Move;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void dataGridView1_DragDrop(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The mouse locations are relative to the screen, so they must be Di2015NewLine    // converted to client coordinates.Di2015NewLine    Point clientPoint = dataGridView1.PointToClient(new Point(e.X, e.Y));Di2015NewLine    // Get the row index of the item the mouse is below. Di2015NewLine    rowIndexOfItemUnderMouseToDrop = dataGridView1.HitTest(clientPoint.X, clientPoint.Y).RowIndex;Di2015NewLine    // If the drag operation was a move then remove and insert the row.Di2015NewLine    if (e.Effect== DragDropEffects.Move)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataGridViewRow rowToMove = e.Data.GetData(typeof(DataGridViewRow)) as DataGridViewRow;Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowIndexFromMouseDown);Di2015NewLine        dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(rowIndexOfItemUnderMouseToDrop, rowToMove);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3172919Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BijectiveDictionary<TKey, TValue> : Dictionary<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public BijectiveDictionary<TValue, TKey> Reversed { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BijectiveDictionary()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Reversed = new BijectiveDictionary<TValue,TKey>(true);Di2015NewLine        this.Reversed.Reversed = this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected BijectiveDictionary(bool reversedWillBeSetFromTheCallingBiji) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void AddRaw(TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Just for demonstration - you should implement the IDictionary interface instead.Di2015NewLine    public new void Add(TKey key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine        this.Reversed.AddRaw(value, key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static explicit operator BijectiveDictionary<TValue, TKey>(BijectiveDictionary<TKey, TValue> biji)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return biji.Reversed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3175762Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DoubleModelBinder : IModelBinderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Binds the value to the model.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="controllerContext">The current controller context.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bindingContext">The binding context.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The new model.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public object BindModel(ControllerContext controllerContext, ModelBindingContext bindingContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var culture = GetUserCulture(controllerContext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string value = bindingContext.ValueProviderDi2015NewLine                           .GetValue(bindingContext.ModelName)Di2015NewLine                           .ConvertTo(typeof(string)) as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double result = 0;Di2015NewLine        double.TryParse(value, NumberStyles.Any, culture, out result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the culture used for formatting, based on the user's input language.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="context">The controller context.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An instance of <see cref="CultureInfo" />.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public CultureInfo GetUserCulture(ControllerContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = context.HttpContext.Request;Di2015NewLine        if (request.UserLanguages == null || request.UserLanguages.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            return CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new CultureInfo(request.UserLanguages[0]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3179201Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void RunService()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //Step1: Create a custom binding with just TCP.Di2015NewLine      BindingElement[] bindingElements = new BindingElement[2];Di2015NewLine      bindingElements[0] = new WebMessageEncodingBindingElement();Di2015NewLine      bindingElements[1] = new HttpTransportBindingElement();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      CustomBinding binding = new CustomBinding(bindingElements);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Step2: Use the binding to build the channel listener.     Di2015NewLine      IChannelListener<IReplyChannel> listener =Di2015NewLine         binding.BuildChannelListener<IReplyChannel>(new Uri("http://localhost:8080/channelapp"),Di2015NewLine          new BindingParameterCollection());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Step3: Listening for messages.Di2015NewLine      listener.Open();Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine          "Listening for incoming channel connections");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Wait for and accept incoming connections.Di2015NewLine      IReplyChannel channel = listener.AcceptChannel();Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("Channel accepted. Listening for messages");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Open the accepted channel.Di2015NewLine      channel.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Wait for and receive a message from the channel.Di2015NewLine      RequestContext request= channel.ReceiveRequest();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Step4: Reading the request message.Di2015NewLine      Message message = request.RequestMessage;Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("Message received");Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("To: {0}", message.Headers.To); // TO contains URL from the browser including query string  Di2015NewLine      if (!message.IsEmpty) // HTTP GET does not contain bodyDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        string data = message.GetBody<string>();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Message content: {0}", data);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Send a reply - You can control reply content based on message.Header.To or by message contentDi2015NewLine      Message replymessage = Message.CreateMessage(binding.MessageVersion, Di2015NewLine        "http://contoso.com/someotheraction", XElement.Parse("<html><body><h1>Hello</h1></body></html>"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Set reply content typeDi2015NewLine      HttpResponseMessageProperty property = new HttpResponseMessageProperty();Di2015NewLine      property.Headers[System.Net.HttpResponseHeader.ContentType] = "text/html; charset=utf-8";Di2015NewLine      replymessage.Properties[HttpResponseMessageProperty.Name] = property;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      request.Reply(replymessage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Step5: Closing objects.Di2015NewLine      //Do not forget to close the message.Di2015NewLine      message.Close();Di2015NewLine      //Do not forget to close RequestContext.Di2015NewLine      request.Close();Di2015NewLine      //Do not forget to close channels.Di2015NewLine      channel.Close();Di2015NewLine      //Do not forget to close listeners.Di2015NewLine      listener.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
